	<item>
		<title>基于 Apache Kylin 的航班准点率分析</title>
		<link>http://kyligence.io/2016/11/1729/</link>
		<pubDate>Fri, 18 Nov 2016 09:56:28 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[shuyan.liu]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://kyligence.io/?p=1729</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<p style="text-align: left;">作者：刘淑艳（Kyligence 实习生）</p>
<p style="text-align: left;"><em>转载请注明出处，原文及来源。</em></p>
<p style="text-align: left;">​ 本文是基于<em>Apache Kylin</em>对Airline数据进行航班准点率、平均延误时间、航班数等方面的分析计算。</p>
<p style="text-align: left;">​ 本案例中的Airline数据集来自<strong>美国交通运输部</strong>，数据主要包含的是<strong>美国本土主流航空公司的飞机起降信息</strong>。包括飞行日期信息(FlightDate)，航班信息(UniqueCarrier,AirlineID)，机场信息（DestCityName,OriginCityName），起飞指标（DepTime,DepDelay），降落指标（ArrTime,ArrDelay），飞行信息(Airtime,Distance)等等。</p>
<p style="text-align: left;">注：<em>Apache Kylin</em> 与 KAP(Kyligence Analytics Platform，由Kyligence公司发行的Kylin企业版) 的建模流程一致，因此本示例同样适用于 KAP，下文提到的 <em>Apache Kylin</em> 与 KAP 可以假设为是同一个。</p>

<div class="md-toc md-end-block md-focus" tabindex="-1" contenteditable="false">
<ul style="list-style: none;">
	<li><span class="md-toc-item md-toc-h1" data-ref="c1"><a class="md-toc-inner"><strong>基于 Apache Kylin 的航班准点率分析</strong></a></span>
<ul style="list-style: none;">
	<li><span class="md-toc-item md-toc-h2" data-ref="c17"><a class="md-toc-inner" href="#user-content-数据来源">数据来源</a></span></li>
	<li><span class="md-toc-item md-toc-h2" data-ref="c26"><a class="md-toc-inner" href="#user-content-数据初步分析">数据初步分析</a></span></li>
	<li><span class="md-toc-item md-toc-h2" data-ref="c62"><a class="md-toc-inner" href="#user-content-导入数据">导入数据</a></span>
<ul style="list-style: none;">
	<li><span class="md-toc-item md-toc-h3" data-ref="c73"><a class="md-toc-inner" href="#user-content-创建外部表">创建外部表</a></span></li>
	<li><span class="md-toc-item md-toc-h3" data-ref="c83"><a class="md-toc-inner" href="#user-content-创建分区表">创建分区表</a></span></li>
	<li><span class="md-toc-item md-toc-h3" data-ref="c95"><a class="md-toc-inner" href="#user-content-向分区表中导入数据">向分区表中导入数据</a></span></li>
</ul>
</li>
	<li><span class="md-toc-item md-toc-h2" data-ref="c109"><a class="md-toc-inner">在Apache Kylin中创建数据模型</a></span>
<ul style="list-style: none;">
	<li><span class="md-toc-item md-toc-h3" data-ref="c110"><a class="md-toc-inner" href="#user-content-创建项目和Model">创建项目和Model</a></span></li>
	<li><span class="md-toc-item md-toc-h3" data-ref="c167"><a class="md-toc-inner" href="#user-content-设计 Cube">设计 Cube</a></span></li>
	<li><span class="md-toc-item md-toc-h3" data-ref="c265"><a class="md-toc-inner" href="#user-content-构建 Cube">构建 Cube</a></span></li>
	<li><span class="md-toc-item md-toc-h3" data-ref="c286"><a class="md-toc-inner" href="#user-content-验证 Cube">验证 Cube</a></span></li>
</ul>
</li>
	<li><span class="md-toc-item md-toc-h2" data-ref="c302"><a class="md-toc-inner">在KyAnalyzer中制作报表</a></span>
<ul style="list-style: none;">
	<li><span class="md-toc-item md-toc-h3" data-ref="c349"><a class="md-toc-inner" href="#user-content-准点率分析">准点率分析</a></span></li>
	<li><span class="md-toc-item md-toc-h3" data-ref="c457"><a class="md-toc-inner" href="#user-content-平均延误时间分析">平均延误时间分析</a></span></li>
	<li><span class="md-toc-item md-toc-h3" data-ref="c483"><a class="md-toc-inner" href="#user-content-航班情况分析">航班情况分析</a></span></li>
</ul>
</li>
	<li><span class="md-toc-item md-toc-h2" data-ref="c508"><a class="md-toc-inner" href="#user-content-总结">总结</a></span></li>
</ul>
</li>
</ul>
</div>
<h2 style="text-align: left;"><a id="user-content-数据来源" class="anchor" href="https://github.com/Kyligence/learn_kylin/blob/master/Airline/airline.cn.md#数据来源"></a>数据来源</h2>
<p style="text-align: left;">下载地址：<a href="http://www.transtats.bts.gov/DL_SelectFields.asp?Table_ID=236&amp;DB_Short_Name=On-Time">http://www.transtats.bts.gov/DL_SelectFields.asp?Table_ID=236&amp;DB_Short_Name=On-Time</a></p>
<p style="text-align: left;">数据文件格式: CSV</p>
<p style="text-align: left;">时间区间: 1987-10-1 — 2016-8-31</p>
<p style="text-align: left;">数据量: 170,933,917 条数据（344个文件 / 69.4G）</p>

<h2 style="text-align: left;"><a id="user-content-数据初步分析" class="anchor" href="https://github.com/Kyligence/learn_kylin/blob/master/Airline/airline.cn.md#数据初步分析"></a>数据初步分析</h2>
<p style="text-align: left;">在使用数据之前，我们需要先来了解本文主要使用的几个字段所代表的含义：</p>

<table class=" alignleft">
<thead>
<tr>
<th>Column</th>
<th>Description</th>
</tr>
</thead>
<tbody>
<tr>
<td>FlightDate</td>
<td>Flight Date (yyyy-mm-dd)</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>Flights</td>
<td>Number of Flights</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>UniqueCarrier</td>
<td>Unique Carrier Code. When the same code has been used by multiple carriers, a numeric suffix is used for earlier users, for example, PA, PA(1), PA(2). Use this field for analysis across a range of years.</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>DepDelay</td>
<td>Difference in minutes between scheduled and actual departure time. Early departures show negative numbers.</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>DepDel15</td>
<td>Departure Delay Indicator, 15 Minutes or More (1=Yes)</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>ArrDel15</td>
<td>Arrival Delay Indicator, 15 Minutes or More (1=Yes)</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>ArrDelay</td>
<td>Difference in minutes between scheduled and actual arrival time. Early arrivals show negative numbers.</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>ArrDelayMinutes</td>
<td>Difference in minutes between scheduled and actual arrival time. Early arrivals set to 0.</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>DepDelayMinutes</td>
<td>Difference in minutes between scheduled and actual departure time. Early departures set to 0.</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table>
<p style="text-align: left;">查看更多数据描述：<a href="http://www.transtats.bts.gov/DL_SelectFields.asp?Table_ID=236&amp;DB_Short_Name=On-Time">http://www.transtats.bts.gov/DL_SelectFields.asp?Table_ID=236&amp;DB_Short_Name=On-Time</a></p>

<h2 style="text-align: left;"><a id="user-content-导入数据" class="anchor" href="https://github.com/Kyligence/learn_kylin/blob/master/Airline/airline.cn.md#导入数据"></a>导入数据</h2>
<p style="text-align: left;">第一步，上传数据到HDFS上，本案例中，我们上传的数据放在HDFS的 <em>/data/airline</em>目录下。</p>
<p style="text-align: left;">第二步，在hive中创建一个数据库<em>Airline</em></p>
<p style="text-align: left;">在hive中运行命令：</p>
<p style="text-align: left;"><code>create database airline;</code></p>
<p style="text-align: left;"><code>use airline;</code></p>

<h3 style="text-align: left;"><a id="user-content-创建外部表" class="anchor" href="https://github.com/Kyligence/learn_kylin/blob/master/Airline/airline.cn.md#创建外部表"></a>创建外部表</h3>
<p style="text-align: left;">​ 根据原数据中数据结构和类型，在hive中构建表。</p>
<p style="text-align: left;">​ 原数据的文件保存在HDFS的 <em>/data/airline</em> 的目录下，我们可以通过Hive 外部表对原数据进行访问，并不需要将表中的数据全部装载进数据库中，这里，我们首先创建一个外部表 <em>airline_data</em>。</p>
<p style="text-align: left;">在hive中运行命令：</p>

<div class="highlight highlight-source-sql" style="text-align: left;">
<pre>CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE airline_data (
    Year <span class="pl-k">int</span>, 
    Quarter <span class="pl-k">int</span>, 
    Month <span class="pl-k">int</span>, 
    DayofMonth <span class="pl-k">int</span>, 
    DayOfWeek <span class="pl-k">int</span>, 
    FlightDate <span class="pl-k">date</span>, 
    UniqueCarrier string, 
    AirlineID <span class="pl-k">bigint</span>, 
    Carrier string, 
    TailNum string, 
    FlightNum <span class="pl-k">int</span>, 
    OriginAirportID <span class="pl-k">bigint</span>, 
    OriginAirportSeqID <span class="pl-k">bigint</span>, 
    OriginCityMarketID <span class="pl-k">bigint</span>, 
    Origin string, 
    OriginCityName string, 
    OriginState string, 
    OriginStateFips <span class="pl-k">int</span>, 
    OriginStateName string, 
    OriginWac <span class="pl-k">int</span>, 
    DestAirportID <span class="pl-k">int</span>, 
    DestAirportSeqID <span class="pl-k">bigint</span>, 
    DestCityMarketID <span class="pl-k">bigint</span>, 
    Dest string, 
    DestCityName string, 
    DestState string, 
    DestStateFips <span class="pl-k">int</span>, 
    DestStateName string, 
    DestWac <span class="pl-k">int</span>, 
    CRSDepTime <span class="pl-k">int</span>, 
    DepTime <span class="pl-k">int</span>, 
    DepDelay <span class="pl-k">int</span>, 
    DepDelayMinutes <span class="pl-k">int</span>, 
    DepDel15 <span class="pl-k">int</span>, 
    DepartureDelayGroups <span class="pl-k">int</span>, 
    DepTimeBlk string, 
    TaxiOut <span class="pl-k">int</span>, 
    WheelsOff <span class="pl-k">int</span>, 
    WheelsOn <span class="pl-k">int</span>, 
    TaxiIn <span class="pl-k">int</span>, 
    CRSArrTime <span class="pl-k">int</span>, 
    ArrTime <span class="pl-k">int</span>, 
    ArrDelay <span class="pl-k">int</span>, 
    ArrDelayMinutes <span class="pl-k">int</span>, 
    ArrDel15 <span class="pl-k">int</span>, 
    ArrivalDelayGroups <span class="pl-k">int</span>, 
    ArrTimeBlk string, 
    Cancelled <span class="pl-k">int</span>, 
    CancellationCode string, 
    Diverted <span class="pl-k">int</span>, 
    CRSElapsedTime <span class="pl-k">int</span>, 
    ActualElapsedTime <span class="pl-k">int</span>, 
    AirTime <span class="pl-k">int</span>, 
    Flights <span class="pl-k">int</span>, 
    Distance <span class="pl-k">bigint</span>, 
    DistanceGroup <span class="pl-k">int</span>, 
    CarrierDelay <span class="pl-k">int</span>, 
    WeatherDelay <span class="pl-k">int</span>, 
    NASDelay <span class="pl-k">int</span>, 
    SecurityDelay <span class="pl-k">int</span>, 
    LateAircraftDelay <span class="pl-k">int</span>, 
    FirstDepTime <span class="pl-k">int</span>, 
    TotalAddGTime <span class="pl-k">int</span>, 
    LongestAddGTime <span class="pl-k">int</span>, 
    DivAirportLandings <span class="pl-k">int</span>, 
    DivReachedDest <span class="pl-k">int</span>, 
    DivActualElapsedTime <span class="pl-k">int</span>, 
    DivArrDelay <span class="pl-k">int</span>, 
    DivDistance <span class="pl-k">int</span>, 
    Div1Airport <span class="pl-k">int</span>, 
    Div1AirportID <span class="pl-k">int</span>, 
    Div1AirportSeqID <span class="pl-k">int</span>, 
    Div1WheelsOn <span class="pl-k">int</span>, 
    Div1TotalGTime <span class="pl-k">int</span>, 
    Div1LongestGTime <span class="pl-k">int</span>, 
    Div1WheelsOff <span class="pl-k">int</span>, 
    Div1TailNum <span class="pl-k">int</span>, 
    Div2Airport <span class="pl-k">int</span>, 
    Div2AirportID <span class="pl-k">int</span>, 
    Div2AirportSeqID <span class="pl-k">int</span>, 
    Div2WheelsOn <span class="pl-k">int</span>, 
    Div2TotalGTime <span class="pl-k">int</span>, 
    Div2LongestGTime <span class="pl-k">int</span>, 
    Div2WheelsOff <span class="pl-k">int</span>, 
    Div2TailNum <span class="pl-k">int</span>, 
    Div3Airport <span class="pl-k">int</span>, 
    Div3AirportID <span class="pl-k">int</span>, 
    Div3AirportSeqID <span class="pl-k">int</span>, 
    Div3WheelsOn <span class="pl-k">int</span>, 
    Div3TotalGTime <span class="pl-k">int</span>, 
    Div3LongestGTime <span class="pl-k">int</span>, 
    Div3WheelsOff <span class="pl-k">int</span>, 
    Div3TailNum <span class="pl-k">int</span>, 
    Div4Airport <span class="pl-k">int</span>, 
    Div4AirportID <span class="pl-k">int</span>, 
    Div4AirportSeqID <span class="pl-k">int</span>, 
    Div4WheelsOn <span class="pl-k">int</span>, 
    Div4TotalGTime <span class="pl-k">int</span>, 
    Div4LongestGTime <span class="pl-k">int</span>, 
    Div4WheelsOff <span class="pl-k">int</span>, 
    Div4TailNum <span class="pl-k">int</span>, 
    Div5Airport <span class="pl-k">int</span>, 
    Div5AirportID <span class="pl-k">int</span>, 
    Div5AirportSeqID <span class="pl-k">int</span>, 
    Div5WheelsOn <span class="pl-k">int</span>, 
    Div5TotalGTime <span class="pl-k">int</span>, 
    Div5LongestGTime <span class="pl-k">int</span>, 
    Div5WheelsOff <span class="pl-k">int</span>, 
    Div5TailNum <span class="pl-k">int</span>
) 
ROW FORMAT SERDE <span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">'</span>org.apache.hadoop.hive.serde2.OpenCSVSerde<span class="pl-pds">'</span></span>
WITH SERDEPROPERTIES (<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>separatorChar<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span> <span class="pl-k">=</span> <span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>,<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span>)  
LOCATION <span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">'</span>/data/airline<span class="pl-pds">'</span></span> 
TBLPROPERTIES(<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">'</span>serialization.null.format<span class="pl-pds">'</span></span><span class="pl-k">=</span><span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">'</span><span class="pl-pds">'</span></span>,<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">'</span>skip.header.line.count<span class="pl-pds">'</span></span><span class="pl-k">=</span><span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">'</span>1<span class="pl-pds">'</span></span>)</pre>
</div>
<p style="text-align: left;">注意：由于本文引用的Airline数据的文件是用逗号(",")作为分隔符的，然而文件中的数据也包含有逗号(",")，因此单纯用<code>ROW FORMAT DELIMITED FIELDS TERMINATED BY ','</code>去分割符语句，会将文件中的逗号(",")也当成分隔符来处理，造成该字段后面的字段数据载入错位。所以此处需要引用一个插件包<code>ROW FORMAT SERDE 'org.apache.hadoop.hive.serde2.OpenCSVSerde' WITH SERDEPROPERTIES ("separatorChar" = ",")</code>来处理以上问题；</p>

<h3 style="text-align: left;"><a id="user-content-创建分区表" class="anchor" href="https://github.com/Kyligence/learn_kylin/blob/master/Airline/airline.cn.md#创建分区表"></a>创建分区表</h3>
<p style="text-align: left;">​ <em>Apache Kylin</em>支持递增式构建Cube，因此如果Hive原始表是分区的，<em>Apache Kylin</em> 在递增式构建时获取数据的性能会更高。这里我们按照飞行日期（FlightDate）对 <em>airline_data</em> 的数据进行分区，创建表名为<em>airline</em>的分区表。</p>
<p style="text-align: left;">在hive中运行命令：</p>

<div class="highlight highlight-source-sql" style="text-align: left;">
<pre><span class="pl-k">CREATE</span> <span class="pl-k">TABLE</span> <span class="pl-en">airline</span> (
    Year <span class="pl-k">int</span>, 
    Quarter <span class="pl-k">int</span>,
    Month <span class="pl-k">int</span>,
    DayofMonth <span class="pl-k">int</span>, 
    DayOfWeek <span class="pl-k">int</span>, 
    UniqueCarrier string, 
    AirlineID <span class="pl-k">bigint</span>, 
    Carrier string, 
    TailNum string, 
    FlightNum <span class="pl-k">int</span>, 
    OriginAirportID <span class="pl-k">bigint</span>, 
    OriginAirportSeqID <span class="pl-k">bigint</span>, 
    OriginCityMarketID <span class="pl-k">bigint</span>, 
    Origin string, 
    OriginCityName string, 
    OriginState string, 
    OriginStateFips <span class="pl-k">int</span>, 
    OriginStateName string, 
    OriginWac <span class="pl-k">int</span>, 
    DestAirportID <span class="pl-k">int</span>, 
    DestAirportSeqID <span class="pl-k">bigint</span>, 
    DestCityMarketID <span class="pl-k">bigint</span>, 
    Dest string, 
    DestCityName string, 
    DestState string, 
    DestStateFips <span class="pl-k">int</span>, 
    DestStateName string, 
    DestWac <span class="pl-k">int</span>, 
    CRSDepTime <span class="pl-k">int</span>, 
    DepTime <span class="pl-k">int</span>, 
    DepDelay <span class="pl-k">int</span>, 
    DepDelayMinutes <span class="pl-k">int</span>, 
    DepDel15 <span class="pl-k">int</span>, 
    DepartureDelayGroups <span class="pl-k">int</span>, 
    DepTimeBlk string, 
    TaxiOut <span class="pl-k">int</span>, 
    WheelsOff <span class="pl-k">int</span>, 
    WheelsOn <span class="pl-k">int</span>, 
    TaxiIn <span class="pl-k">int</span>, 
    CRSArrTime <span class="pl-k">int</span>, 
    ArrTime <span class="pl-k">int</span>, 
    ArrDelay <span class="pl-k">int</span>, 
    ArrDelayMinutes <span class="pl-k">int</span>, 
    ArrDel15 <span class="pl-k">int</span>, 
    ArrivalDelayGroups <span class="pl-k">int</span>, 
    ArrTimeBlk string, 
    Cancelled <span class="pl-k">int</span>, 
    CancellationCode string, 
    Diverted <span class="pl-k">int</span>, 
    CRSElapsedTime <span class="pl-k">int</span>, 
    ActualElapsedTime <span class="pl-k">int</span>, 
    AirTime <span class="pl-k">int</span>, 
    Flights <span class="pl-k">int</span>, 
    Distance <span class="pl-k">bigint</span>, 
    DistanceGroup <span class="pl-k">int</span>, 
    CarrierDelay <span class="pl-k">int</span>, 
    WeatherDelay <span class="pl-k">int</span>, 
    NASDelay <span class="pl-k">int</span>, 
    SecurityDelay <span class="pl-k">int</span>, 
    LateAircraftDelay <span class="pl-k">int</span>, 
    FirstDepTime <span class="pl-k">int</span>, 
    TotalAddGTime <span class="pl-k">int</span>, 
    LongestAddGTime <span class="pl-k">int</span>, 
    DivAirportLandings <span class="pl-k">int</span>, 
    DivReachedDest <span class="pl-k">int</span>, 
    DivActualElapsedTime <span class="pl-k">int</span>, 
    DivArrDelay <span class="pl-k">int</span>, 
    DivDistance <span class="pl-k">int</span>, 
    Div1Airport <span class="pl-k">int</span>, 
    Div1AirportID <span class="pl-k">int</span>, 
    Div1AirportSeqID <span class="pl-k">int</span>, 
    Div1WheelsOn <span class="pl-k">int</span>, 
    Div1TotalGTime <span class="pl-k">int</span>, 
    Div1LongestGTime <span class="pl-k">int</span>, 
    Div1WheelsOff <span class="pl-k">int</span>, 
    Div1TailNum <span class="pl-k">int</span>, 
    Div2Airport <span class="pl-k">int</span>, 
    Div2AirportID <span class="pl-k">int</span>, 
    Div2AirportSeqID <span class="pl-k">int</span>, 
    Div2WheelsOn <span class="pl-k">int</span>, 
    Div2TotalGTime <span class="pl-k">int</span>, 
    Div2LongestGTime <span class="pl-k">int</span>, 
    Div2WheelsOff <span class="pl-k">int</span>, 
    Div2TailNum <span class="pl-k">int</span>, 
    Div3Airport <span class="pl-k">int</span>, 
    Div3AirportID <span class="pl-k">int</span>, 
    Div3AirportSeqID <span class="pl-k">int</span>, 
    Div3WheelsOn <span class="pl-k">int</span>, 
    Div3TotalGTime <span class="pl-k">int</span>, 
    Div3LongestGTime <span class="pl-k">int</span>, 
    Div3WheelsOff <span class="pl-k">int</span>, 
    Div3TailNum <span class="pl-k">int</span>, 
    Div4Airport <span class="pl-k">int</span>, 
    Div4AirportID <span class="pl-k">int</span>, 
    Div4AirportSeqID <span class="pl-k">int</span>, 
    Div4WheelsOn <span class="pl-k">int</span>, 
    Div4TotalGTime <span class="pl-k">int</span>, 
    Div4LongestGTime <span class="pl-k">int</span>, 
    Div4WheelsOff <span class="pl-k">int</span>, 
    Div4TailNum <span class="pl-k">int</span>, 
    Div5Airport <span class="pl-k">int</span>, 
    Div5AirportID <span class="pl-k">int</span>, 
    Div5AirportSeqID <span class="pl-k">int</span>, 
    Div5WheelsOn <span class="pl-k">int</span>, 
    Div5TotalGTime <span class="pl-k">int</span>, 
    Div5LongestGTime <span class="pl-k">int</span>, 
    Div5WheelsOff <span class="pl-k">int</span>, 
    Div5TailNum <span class="pl-k">int</span>
) partitioned by(FlightDate <span class="pl-k">date</span>);</pre>
</div>
<p style="text-align: left;">​ 完成以上步骤后，我们可以查看所处数据库中所包含的表的情况，目前表中有两个表：外部表 <code>airline_data</code> 和分区表<code>airline</code>：</p>
<p style="text-align: left;"><code>hive&gt; show tables;</code></p>
<p style="text-align: left;"><img class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-1722" src="https://kyligence.io/wp-content/uploads/2016/11/one-1-300x67.jpg" alt="one" width="300" height="67" /></p>

<h3 style="text-align: left;"><a id="user-content-向分区表中导入数据" class="anchor" href="https://github.com/Kyligence/learn_kylin/blob/master/Airline/airline.cn.md#向分区表中导入数据"></a>向分区表中导入数据</h3>
<p style="text-align: left;">注意：由于Hive配置文件中<code>hive.exec.max.dynamic.partitions</code> 允许的最大的动态分区的个数默认1000，而元数据的数据量要远远大于这个默认值，因此直接执行分区语句，则会报动态分区异常，如下图：<img class="alignnone wp-image-1724 size-full" src="https://kyligence.io/wp-content/uploads/2016/11/two-1.jpg" alt="two" width="802" height="193" /></p>
<p style="text-align: left;">我们可以通过手动更改最大分区的默认个数的数值来规避这个问题：</p>
<p style="text-align: left;">在hive中运行命令：</p>
<p style="text-align: left;"><code>hive&gt; set hive.exec.max.dynamic.partitions=20000;</code></p>
<p style="text-align: left;">注意：引入插件包去分割符，会将所有字段强行转换为<code>String</code>类型，而后面我们对数据进行分析计算的时候，需要用到的是<code>integer</code>型，因此我们还需要对表中的原数据进行一次数据转换；</p>
<p style="text-align: left;">在hive中运行命令：</p>

<div class="highlight highlight-source-sql" style="text-align: left;">
<pre><span class="pl-k">INSERT INTO</span> TABLE airline partition(FlightDate)
<span class="pl-k">SELECT</span> cast(YEAR <span class="pl-k">AS</span> <span class="pl-k">int</span>) <span class="pl-k">AS</span> YEAR,
       cast(Quarter <span class="pl-k">AS</span> <span class="pl-k">int</span>) <span class="pl-k">AS</span> Quarter,
       cast(MONTH <span class="pl-k">AS</span> <span class="pl-k">int</span>) <span class="pl-k">AS</span> MONTH,
       cast(DayofMonth <span class="pl-k">AS</span> <span class="pl-k">int</span>) <span class="pl-k">AS</span> DayofMonth,
       cast(DayOfWeek <span class="pl-k">AS</span> <span class="pl-k">int</span>) <span class="pl-k">AS</span> DayOfWeek,
       cast(UniqueCarrier <span class="pl-k">AS</span> string) <span class="pl-k">AS</span> UniqueCarrier,
       cast(AirlineID <span class="pl-k">AS</span> <span class="pl-k">bigint</span>) <span class="pl-k">AS</span> AirlineID,
       cast(Carrier <span class="pl-k">AS</span> string) <span class="pl-k">AS</span> Carrier,
       cast(TailNum <span class="pl-k">AS</span> string) <span class="pl-k">AS</span> TailNum,
       cast(FlightNum <span class="pl-k">AS</span> <span class="pl-k">int</span>) <span class="pl-k">AS</span> FlightNum,
       cast(OriginAirportID <span class="pl-k">AS</span> <span class="pl-k">bigint</span>) <span class="pl-k">AS</span> OriginAirportID,
       cast(OriginAirportSeqID <span class="pl-k">AS</span> <span class="pl-k">bigint</span>) <span class="pl-k">AS</span> OriginAirportSeqID,
       cast(OriginCityMarketID <span class="pl-k">AS</span> <span class="pl-k">bigint</span>) <span class="pl-k">AS</span> OriginCityMarketID,
       cast(Origin <span class="pl-k">AS</span> string) <span class="pl-k">AS</span> Origin,
       cast(OriginCityName <span class="pl-k">AS</span> string) <span class="pl-k">AS</span> OriginCityName,
       cast(OriginState <span class="pl-k">AS</span> string) <span class="pl-k">AS</span> OriginState,
       cast(OriginStateFips <span class="pl-k">AS</span> <span class="pl-k">int</span>) <span class="pl-k">AS</span> OriginStateFips,
       cast(OriginStateName <span class="pl-k">AS</span> string) <span class="pl-k">AS</span> OriginStateName,
       cast(OriginWac <span class="pl-k">AS</span> <span class="pl-k">int</span>) <span class="pl-k">AS</span> OriginWac,
       cast(DestAirportID <span class="pl-k">AS</span> <span class="pl-k">int</span>) <span class="pl-k">AS</span> DestAirportID,
       cast(DestAirportSeqID <span class="pl-k">AS</span> <span class="pl-k">bigint</span>) <span class="pl-k">AS</span> DestAirportSeqID,
       cast(DestCityMarketID <span class="pl-k">AS</span> <span class="pl-k">bigint</span>) <span class="pl-k">AS</span> DestCityMarketID,
       cast(Dest <span class="pl-k">AS</span> string) <span class="pl-k">AS</span> Dest,
       cast(DestCityName <span class="pl-k">AS</span> string) <span class="pl-k">AS</span> DestCityName,
       cast(DestState <span class="pl-k">AS</span> string) <span class="pl-k">AS</span> DestState,
       cast(DestStateFips <span class="pl-k">AS</span> <span class="pl-k">int</span>) <span class="pl-k">AS</span> DestStateFips,
       cast(DestStateName <span class="pl-k">AS</span> string) <span class="pl-k">AS</span> DestStateName,
       cast(DestWac <span class="pl-k">AS</span> <span class="pl-k">int</span>) <span class="pl-k">AS</span> DestWac,
       cast(CRSDepTime <span class="pl-k">AS</span> <span class="pl-k">int</span>) <span class="pl-k">AS</span> CRSDepTime,
       cast(DepTime <span class="pl-k">AS</span> <span class="pl-k">int</span>) <span class="pl-k">AS</span> DepTime,
       cast(DepDelay <span class="pl-k">AS</span> <span class="pl-k">int</span>) <span class="pl-k">AS</span> DepDelay,
       cast(DepDelayMinutes <span class="pl-k">AS</span> <span class="pl-k">int</span>) <span class="pl-k">AS</span> DepDelayMinutes,
       cast(DepDel15 <span class="pl-k">AS</span> <span class="pl-k">int</span>) <span class="pl-k">AS</span> DepDel15,
       cast(DepartureDelayGroups <span class="pl-k">AS</span> <span class="pl-k">int</span>) <span class="pl-k">AS</span> DepartureDelayGroups,
       cast(DepTimeBlk <span class="pl-k">AS</span> string) <span class="pl-k">AS</span> DepTimeBlk,
       cast(TaxiOut <span class="pl-k">AS</span> <span class="pl-k">int</span>) <span class="pl-k">AS</span> TaxiOut,
       cast(WheelsOff <span class="pl-k">AS</span> <span class="pl-k">int</span>) <span class="pl-k">AS</span> WheelsOff,
       cast(WheelsOn <span class="pl-k">AS</span> <span class="pl-k">int</span>) <span class="pl-k">AS</span> WheelsOn,
       cast(TaxiIn <span class="pl-k">AS</span> <span class="pl-k">int</span>) <span class="pl-k">AS</span> TaxiIn,
       cast(CRSArrTime <span class="pl-k">AS</span> <span class="pl-k">int</span>) <span class="pl-k">AS</span> CRSArrTime,
       cast(ArrTime <span class="pl-k">AS</span> <span class="pl-k">int</span>) <span class="pl-k">AS</span> ArrTime,
       cast(ArrDelay <span class="pl-k">AS</span> <span class="pl-k">int</span>) <span class="pl-k">AS</span> ArrDelay,
       cast(ArrDelayMinutes <span class="pl-k">AS</span> <span class="pl-k">int</span>) <span class="pl-k">AS</span> ArrDelayMinutes,
       cast(ArrDel15 <span class="pl-k">AS</span> <span class="pl-k">int</span>) <span class="pl-k">AS</span> ArrDel15,
       cast(ArrivalDelayGroups <span class="pl-k">AS</span> <span class="pl-k">int</span>) <span class="pl-k">AS</span> ArrivalDelayGroups,
       cast(ArrTimeBlk <span class="pl-k">AS</span> string) <span class="pl-k">AS</span> ArrTimeBlk,
       cast(Cancelled <span class="pl-k">AS</span> <span class="pl-k">int</span>) <span class="pl-k">AS</span> Cancelled,
       cast(CancellationCode <span class="pl-k">AS</span> string) <span class="pl-k">AS</span> CancellationCode,
       cast(Diverted <span class="pl-k">AS</span> <span class="pl-k">int</span>) <span class="pl-k">AS</span> Diverted,
       cast(CRSElapsedTime <span class="pl-k">AS</span> <span class="pl-k">int</span>) <span class="pl-k">AS</span> CRSElapsedTime,
       cast(ActualElapsedTime <span class="pl-k">AS</span> <span class="pl-k">int</span>) <span class="pl-k">AS</span> ActualElapsedTime,
       cast(AirTime <span class="pl-k">AS</span> <span class="pl-k">int</span>) <span class="pl-k">AS</span> AirTime,
       cast(Flights <span class="pl-k">AS</span> <span class="pl-k">int</span>) <span class="pl-k">AS</span> Flights,
       cast(Distance <span class="pl-k">AS</span> <span class="pl-k">bigint</span>) <span class="pl-k">AS</span> Distance,
       cast(DistanceGroup <span class="pl-k">AS</span> <span class="pl-k">int</span>) <span class="pl-k">AS</span> DistanceGroup,
       cast(CarrierDelay <span class="pl-k">AS</span> <span class="pl-k">int</span>) <span class="pl-k">AS</span> CarrierDelay,
       cast(WeatherDelay <span class="pl-k">AS</span> <span class="pl-k">int</span>) <span class="pl-k">AS</span> WeatherDelay,
       cast(NASDelay <span class="pl-k">AS</span> <span class="pl-k">int</span>) <span class="pl-k">AS</span> NASDelay,
       cast(SecurityDelay <span class="pl-k">AS</span> <span class="pl-k">int</span>) <span class="pl-k">AS</span> SecurityDelay,
       cast(LateAircraftDelay <span class="pl-k">AS</span> <span class="pl-k">int</span>) <span class="pl-k">AS</span> LateAircraftDelay,
       cast(FirstDepTime <span class="pl-k">AS</span> <span class="pl-k">int</span>) <span class="pl-k">AS</span> FirstDepTime,
       cast(TotalAddGTime <span class="pl-k">AS</span> <span class="pl-k">int</span>) <span class="pl-k">AS</span> TotalAddGTime,
       cast(LongestAddGTime <span class="pl-k">AS</span> <span class="pl-k">int</span>) <span class="pl-k">AS</span> LongestAddGTime,
       cast(DivAirportLandings <span class="pl-k">AS</span> <span class="pl-k">int</span>) <span class="pl-k">AS</span> DivAirportLandings,
       cast(DivReachedDest <span class="pl-k">AS</span> <span class="pl-k">int</span>) <span class="pl-k">AS</span> DivReachedDest,
       cast(DivActualElapsedTime <span class="pl-k">AS</span> <span class="pl-k">int</span>) <span class="pl-k">AS</span> DivActualElapsedTime,
       cast(DivArrDelay <span class="pl-k">AS</span> <span class="pl-k">int</span>) <span class="pl-k">AS</span> DivArrDelay,
       cast(DivDistance <span class="pl-k">AS</span> <span class="pl-k">int</span>) <span class="pl-k">AS</span> DivDistance,
       cast(Div1Airport <span class="pl-k">AS</span> <span class="pl-k">int</span>) <span class="pl-k">AS</span> Div1Airport,
       cast(Div1AirportID <span class="pl-k">AS</span> <span class="pl-k">int</span>) <span class="pl-k">AS</span> Div1AirportID,
       cast(Div1AirportSeqID <span class="pl-k">AS</span> <span class="pl-k">int</span>) <span class="pl-k">AS</span> Div1AirportSeqID,
       cast(Div1WheelsOn <span class="pl-k">AS</span> <span class="pl-k">int</span>) <span class="pl-k">AS</span> Div1WheelsOn,
       cast(Div1TotalGTime <span class="pl-k">AS</span> <span class="pl-k">int</span>) <span class="pl-k">AS</span> Div1TotalGTime,
       cast(Div1LongestGTime <span class="pl-k">AS</span> <span class="pl-k">int</span>) <span class="pl-k">AS</span> Div1LongestGTime,
       cast(Div1WheelsOff <span class="pl-k">AS</span> <span class="pl-k">int</span>) <span class="pl-k">AS</span> Div1WheelsOff,
       cast(Div1TailNum <span class="pl-k">AS</span> <span class="pl-k">int</span>) <span class="pl-k">AS</span> Div1TailNum,
       cast(Div2Airport <span class="pl-k">AS</span> <span class="pl-k">int</span>) <span class="pl-k">AS</span> Div2Airport,
       cast(Div2AirportID <span class="pl-k">AS</span> <span class="pl-k">int</span>) <span class="pl-k">AS</span> Div2AirportID,
       cast(Div2AirportSeqID <span class="pl-k">AS</span> <span class="pl-k">int</span>) <span class="pl-k">AS</span> Div2AirportSeqID,
       cast(Div2WheelsOn <span class="pl-k">AS</span> <span class="pl-k">int</span>) <span class="pl-k">AS</span> Div2WheelsOn,
       cast(Div2TotalGTime <span class="pl-k">AS</span> <span class="pl-k">int</span>) <span class="pl-k">AS</span> Div2TotalGTime,
       cast(Div2LongestGTime <span class="pl-k">AS</span> <span class="pl-k">int</span>) <span class="pl-k">AS</span> Div2LongestGTime,
       cast(Div2WheelsOff <span class="pl-k">AS</span> <span class="pl-k">int</span>) <span class="pl-k">AS</span> Div2WheelsOff,
       cast(Div2TailNum <span class="pl-k">AS</span> <span class="pl-k">int</span>) <span class="pl-k">AS</span> Div2TailNum,
       cast(Div3Airport <span class="pl-k">AS</span> <span class="pl-k">int</span>) <span class="pl-k">AS</span> Div3Airport,
       cast(Div3AirportID <span class="pl-k">AS</span> <span class="pl-k">int</span>) <span class="pl-k">AS</span> Div3AirportID,
       cast(Div3AirportSeqID <span class="pl-k">AS</span> <span class="pl-k">int</span>) <span class="pl-k">AS</span> Div3AirportSeqID,
       cast(Div3WheelsOn <span class="pl-k">AS</span> <span class="pl-k">int</span>) <span class="pl-k">AS</span> Div3WheelsOn,
       cast(Div3TotalGTime <span class="pl-k">AS</span> <span class="pl-k">int</span>) <span class="pl-k">AS</span> Div3TotalGTime,
       cast(Div3LongestGTime <span class="pl-k">AS</span> <span class="pl-k">int</span>) <span class="pl-k">AS</span> Div3LongestGTime,
       cast(Div3WheelsOff <span class="pl-k">AS</span> <span class="pl-k">int</span>) <span class="pl-k">AS</span> Div3WheelsOff,
       cast(Div3TailNum <span class="pl-k">AS</span> <span class="pl-k">int</span>) <span class="pl-k">AS</span> Div3TailNum,
       cast(Div4Airport <span class="pl-k">AS</span> <span class="pl-k">int</span>) <span class="pl-k">AS</span> Div4Airport,
       cast(Div4AirportID <span class="pl-k">AS</span> <span class="pl-k">int</span>) <span class="pl-k">AS</span> Div4AirportID,
       cast(Div4AirportSeqID <span class="pl-k">AS</span> <span class="pl-k">int</span>) <span class="pl-k">AS</span> Div4AirportSeqID,
       cast(Div4WheelsOn <span class="pl-k">AS</span> <span class="pl-k">int</span>) <span class="pl-k">AS</span> Div4WheelsOn,
       cast(Div4TotalGTime <span class="pl-k">AS</span> <span class="pl-k">int</span>) <span class="pl-k">AS</span> Div4TotalGTime,
       cast(Div4LongestGTime <span class="pl-k">AS</span> <span class="pl-k">int</span>) <span class="pl-k">AS</span> Div4LongestGTime,
       cast(Div4WheelsOff <span class="pl-k">AS</span> <span class="pl-k">int</span>) <span class="pl-k">AS</span> Div4WheelsOff,
       cast(Div4TailNum <span class="pl-k">AS</span> <span class="pl-k">int</span>) <span class="pl-k">AS</span> Div4TailNum,
       cast(Div5Airport <span class="pl-k">AS</span> <span class="pl-k">int</span>) <span class="pl-k">AS</span> Div5Airport,
       cast(Div5AirportID <span class="pl-k">AS</span> <span class="pl-k">int</span>) <span class="pl-k">AS</span> Div5AirportID,
       cast(Div5AirportSeqID <span class="pl-k">AS</span> <span class="pl-k">int</span>) <span class="pl-k">AS</span> Div5AirportSeqID,
       cast(Div5WheelsOn <span class="pl-k">AS</span> <span class="pl-k">int</span>) <span class="pl-k">AS</span> Div5WheelsOn,
       cast(Div5TotalGTime <span class="pl-k">AS</span> <span class="pl-k">int</span>) <span class="pl-k">AS</span> Div5TotalGTime,
       cast(Div5LongestGTime <span class="pl-k">AS</span> <span class="pl-k">int</span>) <span class="pl-k">AS</span> Div5LongestGTime,
       cast(Div5WheelsOff <span class="pl-k">AS</span> <span class="pl-k">int</span>) <span class="pl-k">AS</span> Div5WheelsOff,
       cast(Div5TailNum <span class="pl-k">AS</span> <span class="pl-k">int</span>) <span class="pl-k">AS</span> Div5TailNum,
       cast(FlightDate <span class="pl-k">AS</span> <span class="pl-k">date</span>) <span class="pl-k">AS</span> FlightDate
<span class="pl-k">FROM</span> airline_data</pre>
</div>
<h2 style="text-align: left;"><a id="user-content-在apache-kylin中创建数据模型" class="anchor" href="https://github.com/Kyligence/learn_kylin/blob/master/Airline/airline.cn.md#在apache-kylin中创建数据模型"></a>在Apache Kylin中创建数据模型</h2>
<h3 style="text-align: left;"><a id="user-content-创建项目和model" class="anchor" href="https://github.com/Kyligence/learn_kylin/blob/master/Airline/airline.cn.md#创建项目和model"></a>创建项目和Model</h3>
<p style="text-align: left;">创建一个新的项目，并命名为<em>Airline</em>。</p>
<p style="text-align: left;"><img class="alignnone wp-image-1688 size-large" src="https://kyligence.io/wp-content/uploads/2016/11/1-1024x351.jpg" alt="1" width="1024" height="351" /></p>
<p style="text-align: left;">第一步，选择刚刚创建的项目<em>Airline</em></p>
<p style="text-align: left;"><img class="alignnone size-full wp-image-1702" src="https://kyligence.io/wp-content/uploads/2016/11/0-1.jpg" alt="0-1" width="729" height="370" /></p>
<p style="text-align: left;">第二步，同步Hive表</p>
<p style="text-align: left;">​ 需要把Hive数据表同步到<em>Apache Kylin</em>当中才能使用。为了方便操作，我们通过<code>Load Hive Table From Tree</code>进行同步，如下图所示：</p>
<p style="text-align: left;"><img class="alignnone size-full wp-image-1704" src="https://kyligence.io/wp-content/uploads/2016/11/0-2.jpg" alt="0-2" width="426" height="269" /></p>
<p style="text-align: left;"><img class="alignnone size-large wp-image-1708" src="https://kyligence.io/wp-content/uploads/2016/11/0-3-1024x263.jpg" alt="0-3" width="1024" height="263" /></p>
<p style="text-align: left;">点击<code>sync</code>同步，导入数据</p>
<p style="text-align: left;"><img class="alignnone size-full wp-image-1686" src="https://kyligence.io/wp-content/uploads/2016/11/0-4.jpg" alt="airline" width="1008" height="593" /></p>
<p style="text-align: left;">第三步，开始创建名为<em>Airline</em>的<code>Model</code>。</p>
<p style="text-align: left;"><img class="alignnone size-large wp-image-1752" src="https://kyligence.io/wp-content/uploads/2016/11/1-2-1024x236.jpg" alt="1" width="1024" height="236" /></p>
<p style="text-align: left;">第四步，选择事实表。</p>
<p style="text-align: left;"><img class="alignnone size-large wp-image-1754" src="https://kyligence.io/wp-content/uploads/2016/11/2-1024x225.jpg" alt="2" width="1024" height="225" /></p>
<p style="text-align: left;"><img class="alignnone size-large wp-image-1756" src="https://kyligence.io/wp-content/uploads/2016/11/3-1024x227.jpg" alt="3" width="1024" height="227" /></p>
<p style="text-align: left;">第五步，选择维度和度量。</p>
<p style="text-align: left;">在本案例中，只有一个事实表：</p>
<p style="text-align: left;">​ 1、为了能够根据日期进行分析，因此将所含的时间列：<code>Year</code>，<code>Quarter</code>，<code>Month</code>，<code>DayOfMonth</code>，<code>DayOfWeek</code>，<code>FlightDate</code>设为维度。</p>
<p style="text-align: left;">​ 2、为了能够根据航空公司运营情况进行分析，因此将所含的航线属性列：<code>UniqueCarrier</code>，<code>AirlineID</code>，<code>DestCityName</code>，<code>OriginCityName</code>，<code>DestState</code>，<code>OriginState</code>，<code>ArrTimeBLK</code>，<code>DepTimeBLK</code>，<code>DepDel15</code>，<code>ArrDel15</code>，<code>Cancelled</code>，<code>Diverted</code>设为维度。</p>
<p style="text-align: left;">​ 3、为了能够对各航空公司运营情况进行比较分析，因此将所含记录飞行时间的数据列：<code>Flights</code>，<code>DepDelayMinutes</code>，<code>ArrDelayMinutes</code>，<code>Distance</code>，<code>ActualElapsedTime</code>设为度量。</p>
<p style="text-align: left;">因此，选择的维度和度量如下:</p>
<p style="text-align: left;">选择维度</p>

<pre><code>1.Year
2.Quarter
3.Month
4.DayOfMonth
5.DayOfWeek
6.FlightDate
7.UniqueCarrier
8.AirlineID
9.ArrTimeBLK
10.DepTimeBLK
11.DestCityName
12.OriginCityName
13.DestState
14.OriginState
15.DepDel15
16.ArrDel15
17.Cancelled
18.Diverted
</code></pre>
<p style="text-align: left;">选择度量</p>

<pre><code>1.Flights
2.DepDelayMinutes
3.ArrDelayMinutes
4.Distance
5.ActualElapsedTime
</code></pre>
<p style="text-align: left;"><img class="alignnone size-large wp-image-1758" src="https://kyligence.io/wp-content/uploads/2016/11/4-1024x346.jpg" alt="4" width="1024" height="346" /></p>
<p style="text-align: left;"><img class="alignnone size-large wp-image-1760" src="https://kyligence.io/wp-content/uploads/2016/11/5-1024x265.jpg" alt="5" width="1024" height="265" /></p>
<p style="text-align: left;">第六步，选择分区字段<code>FlightDate</code>及字段里日期数据的格式。</p>
<p style="text-align: left;"><img class="alignnone size-large wp-image-1762" src="https://kyligence.io/wp-content/uploads/2016/11/6-1024x442.jpg" alt="6" width="1024" height="442" /></p>

<h3 style="text-align: left;"><a id="user-content-设计-cube" class="anchor" href="https://github.com/Kyligence/learn_kylin/blob/master/Airline/airline.cn.md#设计-cube"></a>设计 Cube</h3>
<p style="text-align: left;">第一步，选择添加<code>Cube</code>。</p>
<p style="text-align: left;"><img class="alignnone size-large wp-image-1764" src="https://kyligence.io/wp-content/uploads/2016/11/0-1024x143.jpg" alt="0" width="1024" height="143" /></p>
<p style="text-align: left;">第二步，选择刚刚创建的名为<em>Airline</em>的<code>Model</code>，并建一个名为<em>Airline</em>的<code>Cube</code>。</p>
<p style="text-align: left;"><img class="alignnone size-large wp-image-1766" src="https://kyligence.io/wp-content/uploads/2016/11/1-3-1024x238.jpg" alt="1" width="1024" height="238" /></p>
<p style="text-align: left;">第三步，点击<code>Auto Generator</code>并全选所有字段。</p>
<p style="text-align: left;"><img class="alignnone size-large wp-image-1768" src="https://kyligence.io/wp-content/uploads/2016/11/2-1-1024x161.jpg" alt="2" width="1024" height="161" /></p>
<p style="text-align: left;"><img class="alignnone size-large wp-image-1770" src="https://kyligence.io/wp-content/uploads/2016/11/3-1-1024x353.jpg" alt="3" width="1024" height="353" /></p>
<p style="text-align: left;">第四步，写入需要计算的度量。</p>
<p style="text-align: left;"><img class="alignnone size-large wp-image-1772" src="https://kyligence.io/wp-content/uploads/2016/11/4-1-1024x197.jpg" alt="4" width="1024" height="197" /></p>
<p style="text-align: left;">例如：</p>
<p style="text-align: left;">​ 1、我们要查询各航空公司的销售的总机票数：<code>select sum(Flights),UniqueCarrier from airline group by UniqueCarrier;</code>需要用到 <code>sum(Flights)</code>。</p>
<p style="text-align: left;">2、我们要查询各航空公司的最大延误时间：<code>select max(Depdelayminutes),UniqueCarrier from airline group by UniqueCarrier;</code>需要用到 <code>max(Depdelayminutes)</code>。</p>
<p style="text-align: left;"><img class="alignnone size-large wp-image-1774" src="https://kyligence.io/wp-content/uploads/2016/11/5-1-1024x517.jpg" alt="5" width="1024" height="517" /></p>
<p style="text-align: left;">第五步， 根据数据选择数据的开始时间，在本次案例中，我选择的时间为 <code>1987-10-1 00:00:00</code></p>
<p style="text-align: left;"><img class="alignnone size-large wp-image-1778" src="https://kyligence.io/wp-content/uploads/2016/11/6-1-1-1024x483.jpg" alt="6-1" width="1024" height="483" /></p>
<p style="text-align: left;">第六步，由于需要查询的维度较多，我们通常建议Cube的物理维度（除去衍生维度）在15个以内，当有更多维度的时候，务必分析用户查询模式和数据分布特征，采取维度分组，定义<em>Mandatory Dimensions</em>、<em>Hierarchy Dimensions</em>和 <em>Joint Dimensions</em> 等高级手段，避免维度间的肆意组合（“维度的灾难”），从而使得Cube的构建时间和所占空间在可控范围。</p>
<p style="text-align: left;"><em>Mandatory Dimensions</em>：<code>UniqueCarrier</code></p>
<p style="text-align: left;"><em>Hierarchy Dimensions</em>：<code>Year</code>，<code>Quarter</code>，<code>Month</code>，<code>DayOfWeek</code>，<code>FlightDate</code></p>
<p style="text-align: left;"><em>Joint Dimensions</em>：</p>
<p style="text-align: left;">1.<code>DepDel15</code>，<code>ArrDel15</code>，<code>Cancelled</code>，<code>Diverted</code></p>
<p style="text-align: left;">2.<code>OriginCityName</code>，<code>OriginState</code></p>
<p style="text-align: left;">3.<code>DestCityName</code>，<code>DestState</code></p>
<p style="text-align: left;">4.<code>DepTimeBLK</code>，<code>ArrTimeBLK</code></p>
<p style="text-align: left;">如下图：</p>
<p style="text-align: left;"><img class="alignnone size-large wp-image-1776" src="https://kyligence.io/wp-content/uploads/2016/11/6-1-1024x514.jpg" alt="6" width="1024" height="514" /></p>
<p style="text-align: left;">注意：</p>
<p style="text-align: left;">​ 1、因为整个案例都是围绕着航空公司的一个分析，因此每个分析场景中必须出现的字段是<code>UniqueCarrier</code>，因此这里我们可以将它设置为一个<em>Mandatory Dimensions</em>。</p>
<p style="text-align: left;">​ 2、由于<code>Year</code>，<code>Quarter</code>，<code>Month</code>，<code>DayOfWeek</code>，<code>FlightDate</code>这几个字段之间存在层层递进的关系，因此这里我们可以将它设置为一个<em>Hierarchy Dimensions</em>。</p>
<p style="text-align: left;">​ 3、建立<em>Joint Dimensions</em>的选择标准是：</p>
<p style="text-align: left;">​      a.字段之间存在一对一的关系。例如：目的地名字<code>DestCityName</code>和目的地代号<code>DestState</code>就存在一对一的关系。</p>
<p style="text-align: left;">​      b.字段的基数较小。例如：<code>DepDel15</code>，<code>ArrDel15</code>，<code>Cancelled</code>，<code>Diverted</code>，只有<code>0</code>和<code>1</code>两种值。</p>
<p style="text-align: left;">​      c.如果要查询的场景中，有两个字段必须同时出现，或者同时消失。例如：我要查询<code>DepTimeBLK</code>时，要求<code>ArrTimeBLK</code>的数据必须同时出现。</p>
<p style="text-align: left;">第七步：调整rowkey次序。</p>
<p style="text-align: left;">Rowkey的设计原则如下图：</p>
<p style="text-align: left;"><img class="alignnone size-full wp-image-1720" src="https://kyligence.io/wp-content/uploads/2016/11/4-1.png" alt="4" width="1000" height="524" /></p>
<p style="text-align: left;">例如：</p>
<p style="text-align: left;">1、本案例中，<em>Mandatory &amp; Filter &amp; 基数较高</em> 的列是：<code>FlightDate</code> ，因此这里我们把它排在第一位。</p>
<p style="text-align: left;">2、由于之前我们选择的<em>Mandatory Dimensions</em>是：<code>UniqueCarrier</code> ，因此这里我们把它排在第二位。</p>
<p style="text-align: left;">以上图所示的优先级类推。</p>
<p style="text-align: left;"><img class="alignnone size-large wp-image-1780" src="https://kyligence.io/wp-content/uploads/2016/11/7-1024x514.jpg" alt="7" width="1024" height="514" /></p>
<p style="text-align: left;"><img class="alignnone size-large wp-image-1782" src="https://kyligence.io/wp-content/uploads/2016/11/8-1024x145.jpg" alt="8" width="1024" height="145" /></p>
<p style="text-align: left;">第八步，添加<code>Key</code>。</p>
<p style="text-align: left;"><img class="alignnone size-large wp-image-1784" src="https://kyligence.io/wp-content/uploads/2016/11/9-1024x228.jpg" alt="9" width="1024" height="228" /></p>
<p style="text-align: left;"><img class="alignnone size-large wp-image-1786" src="https://kyligence.io/wp-content/uploads/2016/11/10-1024x270.jpg" alt="10" width="1024" height="270" /></p>
<p style="text-align: left;">注意：</p>
<p style="text-align: left;">1、由于MapReduce的<code>kylin.job.mapreduce.mapper.input.rows</code>默认值为<code>1000000</code>，由于测试环境计算资源有限，在Mapper运行时可能会发生超时（默认超时时间为1小时），我们可以通过缩小这个值，限制单个Mapper处理的数据量，同时也可以增加并发构建的程度。</p>
<p style="text-align: left;">2、我们在建多维数据模型时，在内存不足，而数据量规模较大时，为了减少对内存的损耗，我们改为<em>layer</em>算法构建cube，重定义<code>kylin.cube.algorithm </code>的值为<em>layer</em>。</p>
<p style="text-align: left;">第九步，完成。</p>
<p style="text-align: left;"><img class="alignnone size-large wp-image-1790" src="https://kyligence.io/wp-content/uploads/2016/11/12-1024x251.jpg" alt="12" width="1024" height="251" /></p>

<h3 style="text-align: left;"><a id="user-content-构建-cube" class="anchor" href="https://github.com/Kyligence/learn_kylin/blob/master/Airline/airline.cn.md#构建-cube"></a>构建 Cube</h3>
<p style="text-align: left;">第一步：选择刚刚创建的<em>Cube</em>,在<code>Actions</code>里选择<code>Build</code>，如下图：<img class="alignnone size-large wp-image-1792" src="https://kyligence.io/wp-content/uploads/2016/11/13-1024x260.jpg" alt="13" width="1024" height="260" /></p>
<p style="text-align: left;">第二步：选择结束日期，本案例中我选择的是<code>2016-09-01 00:00:00</code>。</p>
<p style="text-align: left;">注意：为了方便以后增加新的数据<em>Cube</em>进来，所选择的时间区间一定要与所载入数据的时间区间保持一致。</p>
<p style="text-align: left;"><img class="alignnone size-large wp-image-1794" src="https://kyligence.io/wp-content/uploads/2016/11/14-1024x214.jpg" alt="14" width="1024" height="214" /></p>
<p style="text-align: left;">查看<em>Cube</em>进度：</p>
<p style="text-align: left;"><img class="alignnone size-large wp-image-1796" src="https://kyligence.io/wp-content/uploads/2016/11/15-1024x222.jpg" alt="15" width="1024" height="222" /></p>
<p style="text-align: left;"><img class="alignnone size-large wp-image-1798" src="https://kyligence.io/wp-content/uploads/2016/11/16-1024x490.jpg" alt="16" width="1024" height="490" /></p>
<p style="text-align: left;">构建 <em>Cube</em> 完成：</p>
<p style="text-align: left;"><img class="alignnone size-large wp-image-1800" src="https://kyligence.io/wp-content/uploads/2016/11/17-1024x188.jpg" alt="17" width="1024" height="188" /></p>

<h3 style="text-align: left;"><a id="user-content-验证-cube" class="anchor" href="https://github.com/Kyligence/learn_kylin/blob/master/Airline/airline.cn.md#验证-cube"></a>验证 Cube</h3>
<p style="text-align: left;">在完成以上工作之后，我们可以在<code>Insight</code>页面对数据进行验证查询：</p>
<p style="text-align: left;"><img class="alignnone size-large wp-image-1706" src="https://kyligence.io/wp-content/uploads/2016/11/0-2-1024x337.png" alt="0-2" width="1024" height="337" /></p>
<p style="text-align: left;">例如：我们要查询各个航空公司2015年的机票销售数量，我们可以在<code>New Query</code>里输入如下 SQL语句：</p>

<div class="highlight highlight-source-sql" style="text-align: left;">
<pre> <span class="pl-k">select</span> <span class="pl-c1">sum</span>(Flights),UniqueCarrier <span class="pl-k">from</span> airline <span class="pl-k">where</span> airline.<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>YEAR<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span><span class="pl-k">=</span><span class="pl-c1">2015</span> <span class="pl-k">group by</span> UniqueCarrier;</pre>
</div>
<p style="text-align: left;"><img class="alignnone size-large wp-image-1714" src="https://kyligence.io/wp-content/uploads/2016/11/1-1-1024x446.png" alt="1" width="1024" height="446" /></p>
<p style="text-align: left;">为了更直观的查看数据，点击可视化，我们可以看到以图形化方式展示的数据查询结果(如上图的<code>Step.3</code>)。</p>
<p style="text-align: left;"><img class="alignnone size-large wp-image-1716" src="https://kyligence.io/wp-content/uploads/2016/11/2-1-1024x156.png" alt="2" width="1024" height="156" /></p>
<p style="text-align: left;"><img class="alignnone size-large wp-image-1718" src="https://kyligence.io/wp-content/uploads/2016/11/3-1-1024x515.png" alt="3" width="1024" height="515" /></p>

<h2 style="text-align: left;"><a id="user-content-在kyanalyzer中制作报表" class="anchor" href="https://github.com/Kyligence/learn_kylin/blob/master/Airline/airline.cn.md#在kyanalyzer中制作报表"></a>在KyAnalyzer中制作报表</h2>
<p style="text-align: left;">​ KyAnalyzer是Kyligence Analytics Platform（KAP）内置的敏捷式BI平台，允许用户以拖拽的方式自助地制作数据报表，让用户以最简单快捷的方式访问Kylin的数据。</p>
<p style="text-align: left;">例如：我们要查询各个航空公司2015年的航班数量：</p>
<p style="text-align: left;">第一步，在<code>Admin Console</code>加载<em>Cube</em>，操作如图所示：</p>
<p style="text-align: left;"><img class="alignnone size-large wp-image-1802" src="https://kyligence.io/wp-content/uploads/2016/11/1-2-1024x517.png" alt="1" width="1024" height="517" /></p>
<p style="text-align: left;">第二步，在<code>New query</code>中 <code>添加</code>/<code>选择</code> 计算维度：</p>
<p style="text-align: left;"><img class="alignnone size-large wp-image-1804" src="https://kyligence.io/wp-content/uploads/2016/11/2-2.png" alt="2" width="1023" height="600" /></p>
<p style="text-align: left;"><img class="alignnone wp-image-1806 size-large" src="https://kyligence.io/wp-content/uploads/2016/11/3-2-1024x516.png" alt="3" width="1024" height="516" /> <img class="alignnone wp-image-1808 size-full" src="https://kyligence.io/wp-content/uploads/2016/11/4-2.png" alt="4" width="479" height="705" /></p>
<p style="text-align: left;">第三步，筛选数据：</p>
<p style="text-align: left;"><img class="alignnone wp-image-1830 size-full" src="https://kyligence.io/wp-content/uploads/2016/11/17.png" alt="17" width="439" height="248" /></p>
<p style="text-align: left;">第四步，生成数据表：</p>
<p style="text-align: left;"><img class="alignnone size-full wp-image-1810" src="https://kyligence.io/wp-content/uploads/2016/11/5.png" alt="5" width="332" height="381" /></p>
<p style="text-align: left;">第五步，选择右菜单栏图表模式，将生成的数据表以图标的形式展现：</p>
<p style="text-align: left;"><img class="alignnone size-large wp-image-1812" src="https://kyligence.io/wp-content/uploads/2016/11/6-1024x390.png" alt="6" width="1024" height="390" /></p>
<p style="text-align: left;"><img class="alignnone size-large wp-image-1814" src="https://kyligence.io/wp-content/uploads/2016/11/7-1024x530.png" alt="7" width="1024" height="530" /></p>
<p style="text-align: left;">点击如图位置更改行列。行：<code>Year</code>，列：<code>UniqueCarrier</code>。</p>
<p style="text-align: left;"><img class="alignnone size-full wp-image-1852" src="https://kyligence.io/wp-content/uploads/2016/11/30.png" alt="30" width="837" height="201" /></p>
<p style="text-align: left;"><img class="alignnone size-large wp-image-1838" src="https://kyligence.io/wp-content/uploads/2016/11/21-1024x504.png" alt="21" width="1024" height="504" /></p>
<p style="text-align: left;"><img class="alignnone size-large wp-image-1840" src="https://kyligence.io/wp-content/uploads/2016/11/22-1024x530.png" alt="22" width="1024" height="530" /></p>
<p style="text-align: left;"><img class="alignnone size-large wp-image-1842" src="https://kyligence.io/wp-content/uploads/2016/11/23-1024x537.png" alt="23" width="1024" height="537" /></p>
<p style="text-align: left;"><img class="alignnone size-full wp-image-1844" src="https://kyligence.io/wp-content/uploads/2016/11/24.png" alt="24" width="913" height="527" /></p>
<p style="text-align: left;">更多数据的筛选条件菜单，如图：</p>
<p style="text-align: left;"><a href="https://github.com/Kyligence/learn_kylin/blob/master/Airline/images/analyzer/19.png" target="_blank"><img class="alignnone size-full wp-image-1832" src="https://kyligence.io/wp-content/uploads/2016/11/18.png" alt="18" width="895" height="402" /><img class="alignnone size-full wp-image-1834" src="https://kyligence.io/wp-content/uploads/2016/11/19.png" alt="19" width="233" height="501" /></a></p>
<p style="text-align: left;">了解以上操作流程后，我们可以继续进行下面的分析：</p>

<h3 style="text-align: left;"><a id="user-content-准点率分析" class="anchor" href="https://github.com/Kyligence/learn_kylin/blob/master/Airline/airline.cn.md#准点率分析"></a>准点率分析</h3>
<p style="text-align: left;">计算2015年各航空公司准点率的SQL如下：</p>

<div class="highlight highlight-source-sql" style="text-align: left;">
<pre><span class="pl-k">select</span> <span class="pl-c1">t1</span>.<span class="pl-c1">UniqueCarrier</span>,<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>YEAR<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span>,<span class="pl-c1">1</span>.<span class="pl-c1">0</span><span class="pl-k">*</span><span class="pl-c1">t1</span>.<span class="pl-c1">a</span><span class="pl-k">/</span><span class="pl-c1">t2</span>.<span class="pl-c1">a</span> <span class="pl-k">as</span> OnTime <span class="pl-k">from</span> (
    <span class="pl-k">select</span> <span class="pl-c1">count</span>(<span class="pl-k">*</span>) <span class="pl-k">as</span> a,UniqueCarrier,<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>YEAR<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span> <span class="pl-k">from</span> airline 
<span class="pl-k">                   where</span> <span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>DEPDEL15<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span><span class="pl-k">=</span><span class="pl-c1">0</span> <span class="pl-k">and</span> <span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>YEAR<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span><span class="pl-k">=</span><span class="pl-c1">2015</span> <span class="pl-k">group by</span> UniqueCarrier,<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>YEAR<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span>
        ) t1 <span class="pl-k">inner join</span> (
            <span class="pl-k">select</span> <span class="pl-c1">count</span>(<span class="pl-k">*</span>) <span class="pl-k">as</span> a,UniqueCarrier <span class="pl-k">from</span> airline 
<span class="pl-k">                          where</span> <span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>YEAR<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span><span class="pl-k">=</span><span class="pl-c1">2015</span> <span class="pl-k">group by</span> UniqueCarrier
                ) t2 <span class="pl-k">on</span> <span class="pl-c1">t1</span>.<span class="pl-c1">UniqueCarrier</span> <span class="pl-k">=</span><span class="pl-c1">t2</span>.<span class="pl-c1">UniqueCarrier</span>;</pre>
</div>
<p style="text-align: left;">选择维度：</p>

<pre><code>1.UniqueCarrier
2.DepDel15
3.Year
</code></pre>
<p style="text-align: left;">选择度量：</p>

<pre><code>1.count(1)
</code></pre>
<p style="text-align: left;">​ 为了保证样本的准确性，我们抽取十年（2005年 — 2015年）的准点率数据来对各航空公司准点率进行比较分析：</p>
<p style="text-align: left;">在KyAnalyzer制作表如下：</p>
<p style="text-align: left;">​ （2005年 — 2015年）准点率</p>
<p style="text-align: left;"><img class="alignnone size-full wp-image-1822" src="https://kyligence.io/wp-content/uploads/2016/11/12.png" alt="12" width="864" height="616" /></p>
<p style="text-align: left;">​ （2005年 — 2015年）各航空公司准点率柱状图</p>
<p style="text-align: left;"><img class="alignnone size-large wp-image-1850" src="https://kyligence.io/wp-content/uploads/2016/11/29-1024x560.png" alt="29" width="1024" height="560" /></p>
<p style="text-align: left;">这里我们着重筛选出这十年中准点率最高的前三名进行分析：</p>
<p style="text-align: left;">如：抽取2005年准点率前三名的SQL如下：</p>

<div class="highlight highlight-source-sql" style="text-align: left;">
<pre><span class="pl-k">select</span> <span class="pl-c1">t1</span>.<span class="pl-c1">UniqueCarrier</span>,<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>YEAR<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span>,<span class="pl-c1">1</span>.<span class="pl-c1">0</span><span class="pl-k">*</span><span class="pl-c1">t1</span>.<span class="pl-c1">a</span><span class="pl-k">/</span><span class="pl-c1">t2</span>.<span class="pl-c1">a</span> <span class="pl-k">as</span> OnTime <span class="pl-k">from</span> (
    <span class="pl-k">select</span> <span class="pl-c1">count</span>(<span class="pl-k">*</span>) <span class="pl-k">as</span> a,UniqueCarrier,<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>YEAR<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span> <span class="pl-k">from</span> airline 
<span class="pl-k">                       where</span> <span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>DEPDEL15<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span><span class="pl-k">=</span><span class="pl-c1">0</span> <span class="pl-k">and</span> <span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>YEAR<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span><span class="pl-k">=</span><span class="pl-c1">2005</span> <span class="pl-k">group by</span> UniqueCarrier,<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>YEAR<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span>
        ) t1 <span class="pl-k">inner join</span> (
            <span class="pl-k">select</span> <span class="pl-c1">count</span>(<span class="pl-k">*</span>) <span class="pl-k">as</span> a,UniqueCarrier <span class="pl-k">from</span> airline 
<span class="pl-k">                           where</span> <span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>YEAR<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span><span class="pl-k">=</span><span class="pl-c1">2005</span> <span class="pl-k">group by</span> UniqueCarrier
                ) t2 <span class="pl-k">on</span> <span class="pl-c1">t1</span>.<span class="pl-c1">UniqueCarrier</span> <span class="pl-k">=</span><span class="pl-c1">t2</span>.<span class="pl-c1">UniqueCarrier</span> <span class="pl-k">order by</span> OnTime <span class="pl-k">desc</span> <span class="pl-k">limit</span> <span class="pl-c1">3</span>;</pre>
</div>
<p style="text-align: left;">以此类推，记录下十年间前三名的公司：</p>

<table class=" alignleft">
<thead>
<tr>
<th align="center"></th>
<th align="center">1</th>
<th align="center">2</th>
<th align="center">3</th>
</tr>
</thead>
<tbody>
<tr>
<td align="center">2005</td>
<td align="center">HA</td>
<td align="center">AS</td>
<td align="center">DL</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td align="center">2006</td>
<td align="center">HA</td>
<td align="center">KH</td>
<td align="center">F9</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td align="center">2007</td>
<td align="center">HA</td>
<td align="center">KH</td>
<td align="center">DL</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td align="center">2008</td>
<td align="center">KH</td>
<td align="center">HA</td>
<td align="center">US</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td align="center">2009</td>
<td align="center">HA</td>
<td align="center">US</td>
<td align="center">OO</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td align="center">2010</td>
<td align="center">HA</td>
<td align="center">AS</td>
<td align="center">US</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td align="center">2011</td>
<td align="center">HA</td>
<td align="center">AS</td>
<td align="center">FL</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td align="center">2012</td>
<td align="center">HA</td>
<td align="center">AS</td>
<td align="center">FL</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td align="center">2013</td>
<td align="center">HA</td>
<td align="center">AS</td>
<td align="center">US</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td align="center">2014</td>
<td align="center">HA</td>
<td align="center">AS</td>
<td align="center">DL</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td align="center">2015</td>
<td align="center">HA</td>
<td align="center">AS</td>
<td align="center">DL</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table>
<p style="text-align: left;">（由于美国交通运输部公布的航空公司的数据不够完整和全面，部分航空公司的航空数据在部分年份存在缺失，所以我们暂时将数据为空的航公司数据产生的影响忽略不计。）</p>
<p style="text-align: left;">​ 由上表我们可以很轻易的发现，除了2008年被 KH 公司超越以外，HA 的准点率稳处于行业间领先地位，AS 航空公司表现其次，F9和OO公司分别在2006年和2009年挤进行业前三，因此，我们可以抽选出比较特殊的HA,AS,F9,OO这四家航空公司再进一步的分析。</p>
<p style="text-align: left;"><img class="alignnone size-full wp-image-1854" src="https://kyligence.io/wp-content/uploads/2016/11/32.png" alt="32" width="866" height="162" /></p>
<p style="text-align: left;">​ （2005年 — 2015年）HA,AS,F9,OO这四家航空公司的准点率折线图</p>
<p style="text-align: left;"><img class="alignnone size-large wp-image-1856" src="https://kyligence.io/wp-content/uploads/2016/11/33-1024x566.png" alt="33" width="1024" height="566" /></p>
<p style="text-align: left;">从上图中我们不难看出：</p>
<p style="text-align: left;">​ 1、HA的准点率波动较小，一直保持在领先位置。</p>
<p style="text-align: left;">​ 2、F9和OO公司在准点率上其实差距不大。</p>
<p style="text-align: left;">​ 3、AS公司的准点率一直在不断提升。</p>

<h3 style="text-align: left;"><a id="user-content-平均延误时间分析" class="anchor" href="https://github.com/Kyligence/learn_kylin/blob/master/Airline/airline.cn.md#平均延误时间分析"></a>平均延误时间分析</h3>
<p style="text-align: left;">​ 在上文对HA,AS,F9,OO这四家航空公司的准点率分析的基础上，我们想要更深一步了解其他因素对准点率变化的影响。所以接下来，我们继续对这四家公司进行平均延误时间的分析。</p>

<div class="highlight highlight-source-sql" style="text-align: left;">
<pre><span class="pl-k">select</span> <span class="pl-c1">avg</span>(DEPDELAYMINUTES),UniqueCarrier,<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>YEAR<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span> <span class="pl-k">from</span> airline 
<span class="pl-k">          where</span> <span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>UNIQUECARRIER<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span> <span class="pl-k">in</span> (<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">'</span>HA<span class="pl-pds">'</span></span>,<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">'</span>AS<span class="pl-pds">'</span></span>,<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">'</span>F9<span class="pl-pds">'</span></span>,<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">'</span>OO<span class="pl-pds">'</span></span>) <span class="pl-k">and</span> <span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>YEAR<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span> between <span class="pl-c1">2005</span> <span class="pl-k">and</span> <span class="pl-c1">2015</span> 
<span class="pl-k">                group by</span> UniqueCarrier,<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>YEAR<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span>;</pre>
</div>
<p style="text-align: left;">选择维度：</p>

<pre><code>1.UniqueCarrier
2.DepDel15
3.Year
</code></pre>
<p style="text-align: left;">选择度量：</p>

<pre><code>1.avg(DepDelayMinutes)
</code></pre>
<p style="text-align: left;">在KyAnalyzer制作表如下：</p>
<p style="text-align: left;"><img class="alignnone size-full wp-image-1818" src="https://kyligence.io/wp-content/uploads/2016/11/10-1.png" alt="10" width="796" height="302" /></p>
<p style="text-align: left;">​ （2005年 — 2015年）HA,AS,F9,OO这四家航空公司的平均延误时间折线图</p>
<p style="text-align: left;"><img class="alignnone size-large wp-image-1820" src="https://kyligence.io/wp-content/uploads/2016/11/11-1024x575.png" alt="11" width="1024" height="575" /></p>
<p style="text-align: left;">小结：由上图可知：</p>
<p style="text-align: left;">​ 1、而准点率表现最好的 HA 公司，平均延误时间相较于其他公司也是最低的。</p>
<p style="text-align: left;">​ 2、虽然F9和OO公司在准点率上差距不大，但F9的平均延误时间在不断增加，而OO公司是相对稳定的。所以 总体而言，OO公司的运营情况是优于F9公司的。</p>
<p style="text-align: left;">​ 3、AS 公司的平均延误时间在逐年降低，经过前面的分析，我们了解到AS公司的准点率也是在不断提升的，因此，我们可以得出结论，说明AS公司的管理模式积极且有效的。</p>

<h3 style="text-align: left;"><a id="user-content-航班情况分析" class="anchor" href="https://github.com/Kyligence/learn_kylin/blob/master/Airline/airline.cn.md#航班情况分析"></a>航班情况分析</h3>
<p style="text-align: left;">​ 现在，我们想要对HA,AS,F9,OO这四家航空公司的综合情况进行考量，因此，同样我们还需要抽取这四家航空公司2012年9月到2016年8月的航班数量，进行一个比较分析。</p>
<p style="text-align: left;">我们可以直接可以通过KyAnalyzer制作图表如下：</p>
<p style="text-align: left;">​ （2012年9月—2016年8月）HA,AS,F9,OO这四家航空公司的航班数变化情况折线图</p>
<p style="text-align: left;"><img class="alignnone size-large wp-image-1824" src="https://kyligence.io/wp-content/uploads/2016/11/14-1024x592.png" alt="14" width="1024" height="592" /></p>
<p style="text-align: left;">小结：当显示结果细化到月份后，我们发现：</p>
<p style="text-align: left;">​ 1、OO公司航班数远远大于其他三家。</p>
<p style="text-align: left;">​ 2、各航空公司在2013年9月至11月，和2014年9月至11月，航班数均有显著增加的波动，且较为同步。</p>
<p style="text-align: left;">经过对我们抽选出的HA,AS,F9,OO这四家典型公司的准点率、平均延误时间、航班数综合计算的分析结果，我们可以得出如下结论：</p>
<p style="text-align: left;">​ 1、HA是服务品质最高的公司。</p>
<p style="text-align: left;">​ 2、OO是规模最大的公司。</p>
<p style="text-align: left;">​ 3、F9公司管理模式不是太好，需要对管理模式及运营模式加强完善。</p>
<p style="text-align: left;">​ 4、AS是最具潜力的公司。</p>

<h2 style="text-align: left;"><a id="user-content-总结" class="anchor" href="https://github.com/Kyligence/learn_kylin/blob/master/Airline/airline.cn.md#总结"></a>总结</h2>
<p style="text-align: left;">​ 经过从数据的处理到生成报表的一系列操作，我们对于<em>Apache Kylin</em>（KAP）和 KyAnalyzer 的使用有了更为明确的了解，更为直观的认识，本文所述只是<em>Apache Kylin</em>和KyAnalyzer的一些基本用法。由于<em>Apache Kylin</em>与KyAnalyzer的功能强大，文章中不能进行一一的说明，还需要大家多多探究。本文旨在交流 <em>Apache Kylin</em>和 KyAnalyzer 的数据处理过程，所运用的数据有差异，结果也会出现差异，因此结论仅供参考。</p>
<p style="text-align: left;">作者：刘淑艳（Kyligence实习生）</p>
<p style="text-align: left;">联系我们：<a href="mailto:info@kyligence.io">info@kyligence.io</a></p>
<p style="text-align: left;">上海跬智信息技术有限公司 <a href="http://kyligence.io/">http://kyligence.io</a></p>
<p style="text-align: left;"><em>转载请注明出处，原文及来源。</em></p>
<p style="text-align: left;">参考资料：</p>
<p style="text-align: left;"><a href="http://kyligence.io/">http://kyligence.io</a></p>
<p style="text-align: left;"><a href="http://kylin.apache.org/">http://kylin.apache.org</a></p>
<p style="text-align: left;"><a href="http://www.transtats.bts.gov/DL_SelectFields.asp?Table_ID=236&amp;DB_Short_Name=On-Time">http://www.transtats.bts.gov/DL_SelectFields.asp?Table_ID=236&amp;DB_Short_Name=On-Time</a></p>
<p style="text-align: left;"><a href="http://kyligence.gitbooks.io/KAP-manual/">http://kyligence.gitbooks.io/KAP-manual/</a></p>
<p style="text-align: left;"><a href="https://github.com/Kyligence/learn_kylin/">https://github.com/Kyligence/learn_kylin/</a></p>]]></content:encoded>
