	</item>
	<item>
		<title>【技术帖】如何优化Kylin的Cube构建性能</title>
		<link>http://kyligence.io/2017/02/2832/</link>
		<pubDate>Tue, 14 Feb 2017 08:24:29 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[tianyu]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://kyligence.io/?p=2832</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<div id="magicdomid523" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-LdZ6v42K9mDgolcN" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746 font-size-3">Kylin将Cube的构建分成若干子任务，然后由任务引擎依次执行。这些子任务包括Hive操作，MapReduce任务，以及HBase操作等 。通常一次构建耗时几分钟到几小时，取决于数据量、模型复杂度、集群计算能力、配置等多方面因素。当用户有很多个Cube需要频繁构建时，了解Cube构建并有针对地进行优化就显得尤为必要。</span></div>
<div id="magicdomid524" class="">

<hr />

</div>
<div id="magicdomid525" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-pjS9mcRg6GxfWbcU" data-author-name="幂幂"><strong><span class="author-3380746 font-size-3">作者简介</span></strong></div>
<div id="magicdomid526" class=""></div>
<div id="magicdomid527" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-5lr5SneWBoSiBgLq" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746 font-size-3">史少锋，Kyligence技术合伙人&amp;资深架构师，Apache Kylin核心开发者和项目管理委员会成员（PMC），专注于大数据分析和云计算技术。曾任eBay全球分析基础架构部大数据高级工程师，IBM云计算部门软件架构师。</span></div>
<div class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-5lr5SneWBoSiBgLq" data-author-name="幂幂"></div>
<div class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-5lr5SneWBoSiBgLq" data-author-name="幂幂"></div>
<div id="magicdomid528" class=""></div>
<div id="magicdomid529" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-YLg12GjGXHs1c4OJ" data-author-name="幂幂"><strong><span class="author-3380746 font-size-3">Apache Kylin介绍</span></strong></div>
<div id="magicdomid530" class=""></div>
<div id="magicdomid531" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-aFa3fja3omJWYydE" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746 font-size-3">Apache Kylin是一个开源的分布式查询引擎，在Apache Hadoop之上提供标准SQL的查询接口， 支持对TB到PB的数据量级以秒级别的低延迟进行查询，从而使得大数据的交互式分析变成可能。Kylin于2014年开源并加入Apache孵化器，2015年毕业成为Apache独立顶级项目，迄今在诸多行业和公司得到广泛使用。此外Kylin也是首个完全由中国工程师开发并贡献到Apache基金会的项目。</span></div>
<div class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-aFa3fja3omJWYydE" data-author-name="幂幂"></div>
<div class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-aFa3fja3omJWYydE" data-author-name="幂幂"></div>
<div id="magicdomid532" class=""></div>
<div id="magicdomid533" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-Pxe8DKAZUPJl0dSr" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746 font-size-3"><strong>小贴士</strong> </span></div>
<div id="magicdomid534" class=""></div>
<div id="magicdomid535" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-4WgLXPAtxODpzbBu" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746 font-size-3">如果您还不了解Kylin的话，请访问项目主页</span><span class="author-3380746 font-size-3 url"><a href="https://kylin.apache.org/">https://kylin.apache.org</a></span><span class="author-3380746 font-size-3"> 。</span></div>
<div class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-4WgLXPAtxODpzbBu" data-author-name="幂幂"></div>
<div id="magicdomid536" class=""></div>
<div id="magicdomid537" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-hV3PLh7Jzb8DOPLi" data-author-name="幂幂"><strong><span class="author-3380746 font-size-3">如何优化</span></strong></div>
<div class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-hV3PLh7Jzb8DOPLi" data-author-name="幂幂"></div>
<div id="magicdomid538" class=""></div>
<div id="magicdomid539" class=""></div>
<div id="magicdomid540" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-OFl3ycNuPu82UeOp" data-author-name="幂幂"><img class="aligncenter wp-image-2863 size-full" src="https://kyligence.io/wp-content/uploads/2017/02/640.jpeg" alt="640" width="640" height="313" /></div>
<div class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-E42VAIruk0zW2jwB" data-author-name="幂幂"></div>
<div id="magicdomid541" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-E42VAIruk0zW2jwB" style="text-align: center;" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746 font-size-3">图1. Apache Kylin架构图</span></div>
<div class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-E42VAIruk0zW2jwB" data-author-name="幂幂"></div>
<div id="magicdomid542" class=""></div>
<div class=""></div>
<div id="magicdomid543" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-LElcH7I4amiXCh0E" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746 font-size-3">Kylin与其它大数据查询引擎的主要区别在于，Kylin对数据的计算分为预计算和后计算两个阶段：预计算根据用户建立的模型，通过一系列离线任务将原始数据加工成多维立方体（Cube）；后计算将用户的SQL查询转换成对Cube的即时查询， 再处理后得到最终的结果。因为很大一部分计算工作已经在预计算阶段完成，后计算往往能在亚秒级完成，从而对用户的查询请求可以很快做出响应，并且当数据量成倍增长的时候，依然可以保持近乎0(1)的超低时间复杂度。</span></div>
<div class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-LElcH7I4amiXCh0E" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746 font-size-3"> </span></div>
<div id="magicdomid544" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-raUqmN4aL18U1WLR" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746 font-size-3"> </span></div>
<div id="magicdomid545" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-q3K25mGmz22zwsuH" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746 font-size-3">Kylin将Cube的构建分成若干子任务，然后由任务引擎依次执行。这些子任务包括Hive操作，MapReduce任务，以及HBase操作等 。通常一次构建耗时几分钟到几小时，取决于数据量、模型复杂度、集群计算能力、配置等多方面因素。当用户有很多个Cube需要频繁构建时，了解Cube构建并有针对地进行优化就显得尤为必要。本文结合Apache Kylin 1.6.0，按子任务的执行次序，介绍Kylin中Cube构建（也即预计算 ）的原理以及可优化的手段。</span></div>
<div class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-q3K25mGmz22zwsuH" data-author-name="幂幂"></div>
<div class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-q3K25mGmz22zwsuH" data-author-name="幂幂"></div>
<div id="magicdomid546" class=""></div>
<div id="magicdomid547" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-hCJe8K1gJcKi6NGc" data-author-name="幂幂"></div>
<div id="magicdomid548" class=""></div>
<div id="magicdomid549" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-WUEZGXc0XcbfIkYC" data-author-name="幂幂"><strong><span class="author-3380746 font-size-3">Step 1. Create Intermediate Hive Table (创建临时的 Hive 平表)）</span></strong></div>
<div id="magicdomid550" class=""></div>
<div id="magicdomid551" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-XungEMLfI1LYcGb7" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746 font-size-3">作为构建的第一步，Kylin从Apache Hive中将源数据抽取出来并插入到一张临时创建的表中，后续的处理将以这张表为输入，待Cube构建完成后，再将其删除。抽取时只选择Cube模型中用到的列，如果模型是按某个日期／时间列做分区的，还会将时间条件应用在创建平表的Hive命令中。下面是一个创建平表的示例语句： </span></div>
<div id="magicdomid552" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-tPVItHTiw7tArSus" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746 font-size-3"> </span></div>
<div id="magicdomid553" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-tjZLFiBboxVJoOBM" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746 font-size-3">hive -e "USE default;</span></div>
<div id="magicdomid554" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-4Q6V8NMgBWhfqiqL" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746 font-size-3">DROP TABLE IF EXISTS kylin_intermediate_airline_cube_v3610f668a3cdb437e8373c034430f6c34;</span></div>
<div id="magicdomid555" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-RucOWhFO6biNQuW2" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746 font-size-3"> </span></div>
<div id="magicdomid556" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-JCTpztbgJ4isenLj" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746 font-size-3">CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE IF NOT EXISTS kylin_intermediate_airline_cube_v3610f668a3cdb437e8373c034430f6c34</span></div>
<div id="magicdomid557" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-6UfutB1ouUmnwUSS" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746 font-size-3">(AIRLINE_FLIGHTDATE date, AIRLINE_YEAR int, AIRLINE_QUARTER int, ..., AIRLINE_ARRDELAYMINUTES int)</span></div>
<div id="magicdomid558" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-YXFtSIT9BnwNOXIL" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746 font-size-3">STORED AS SEQUENCEFILE</span></div>
<div id="magicdomid559" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-wqLQ5Ox4qqnBfXkO" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746 font-size-3">LOCATION 'hdfs:///kylin/kylin200instance/kylin-0a8d71e8-df77-495f-b501-03c06f785b6c/kylin_intermediate_airline_cube_v3610f668a3cdb437e8373c034430f6c34';</span></div>
<div id="magicdomid560" class=""></div>
<div id="magicdomid561" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-tN8cP3zngZlu6sGK" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746 font-size-3">SET dfs.replication=2;</span></div>
<div id="magicdomid562" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-0Z0oGJ0WrMyjKiV5" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746 font-size-3">SET hive.exec.compress.output=true;</span></div>
<div id="magicdomid563" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-vHqyqBH2vO9n1wQm" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746 font-size-3">SET hive.auto.convert.join.noconditionaltask=true;</span></div>
<div id="magicdomid564" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-9VYM3ii4w1yCtDvc" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746 font-size-3">SET hive.auto.convert.join.noconditionaltask.size=100000000;</span></div>
<div id="magicdomid565" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-L45EyI1fA2THyJPC" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746 font-size-3">SET mapreduce.job.split.metainfo.maxsize=-1;</span></div>
<div id="magicdomid566" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-4JD8VeA1yGP4hB4V" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746 font-size-3"> </span></div>
<div id="magicdomid567" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-K1JBBniSRtCrfmiC" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746 font-size-3">INSERT OVERWRITE TABLE kylin_intermediate_airline_cube_v3610f668a3cdb437e8373c034430f6c34 SELECT</span></div>
<div id="magicdomid568" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-xhOyPlRp0aGFDKcR" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746 font-size-3">AIRLINE.FLIGHTDATE, AIRLINE.YEAR, AIRLINE.QUARTER,..., AIRLINE.ARRDELAYMINUTES</span></div>
<div id="magicdomid569" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-dUwbPc7ZHw4bk8MG" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746 font-size-3">FROM AIRLINE.AIRLINE as AIRLINE</span></div>
<div id="magicdomid570" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-cGCAIk8yTdQz3ELg" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746 font-size-3">WHERE (AIRLINE.FLIGHTDATE &gt;= '1987-10-01' AND AIRLINE.FLIGHTDATE &lt; '2017-01-01');"</span></div>
<div id="magicdomid571" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-Uc8XAYwTKgvblEWe" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746 font-size-3"> </span></div>
<div id="magicdomid572" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-RBmWz9YQtVEB5yfv" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746 font-size-3">在执行INSERT INTO 的Hive语句时，Kylin会应用出现在conf/kylin_hive_conf.xml中的配置参数和值，例如使用较少的HDFS复本（dfs.replication=2）、启用Hive的mapper内连接（hive.auto.convert.join.noconditionaltask=true）等。如果您的环境需要其它有益于Hive执行的参数，添加在这个配置文件中即可对所有Cube生效；如果您想为不同Cube设置不同的Hive参数值，可以在创建Cube的“参数覆盖”页，使用前缀kylin.hive.config.override.进行配置。</span></div>
<div id="magicdomid573" class=""></div>
<div id="magicdomid574" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-O4C30h1CVEDTRKQS" data-author-name="幂幂"><img class="aligncenter wp-image-2865 size-full" src="https://kyligence.io/wp-content/uploads/2017/02/640-2.jpeg" alt="640-2" width="640" height="195" /></div>
<div class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-FuskywLYSW9rWqRE" data-author-name="幂幂"></div>
<div id="magicdomid575" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-FuskywLYSW9rWqRE" style="text-align: center;" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746 font-size-3">图二：在Cube上覆盖Hive配置参数</span></div>
<div class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-FuskywLYSW9rWqRE" data-author-name="幂幂"></div>
<div id="magicdomid576" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-Yf8oDyuHnfn0JQi9" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746 font-size-3"> </span></div>
<div id="magicdomid577" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-3u3gym4qjC5HNr2F" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746 font-size-3">在此例中，Cube是按FLIGHTDATE 列分区的，因而构建时Kylin会将用户选择的时间范围作为where过滤条件，让Hive抽取只在此时间范围内的数据。如果此时间列，正好也是Hive表的分区列的话，Hive可以智能地利用此条件只扫描对应分区内的文件，从而减少读取文件的数量。因此，当您的源数据表是按日期增量导入时，建议对Hive表按日期列做分区，并且在Kylin的数据模型中，使用相同的列做为Cube的分区列。</span></div>
<div class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-3u3gym4qjC5HNr2F" data-author-name="幂幂"></div>
<div id="magicdomid578" class=""></div>
<div id="magicdomid579" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-DtF9Qp9YhoLJQ3pl" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746 font-size-3">此外，如果Hive中默认开启了自动合并小文件的话，可以在conf/kylin_hive_conf.xml添加以下配置项以关闭自动合并，因为Kylin会有自己的方式来合并文件（下一步会介绍）：</span></div>
<div id="magicdomid580" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-2PyXcRz5GRu2zaN0" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746 font-size-3"> </span></div>
<div id="magicdomid581" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-oGAMOal2E4RFvIVg" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746 font-size-3">    &lt;property&gt;</span></div>
<div id="magicdomid582" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-hE7F0RXDUqCdtHXM" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746 font-size-3">        &lt;name&gt;hive.merge.mapfiles&lt;/name&gt;</span></div>
<div id="magicdomid583" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-HOif9ixEvweISjlR" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746 font-size-3">        &lt;value&gt;false&lt;/value&gt;</span></div>
<div id="magicdomid584" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-ZKd3ObvIl5WlDol4" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746 font-size-3">        &lt;description&gt;Disable Hive's auto merge&lt;/description&gt;</span></div>
<div id="magicdomid585" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-mKjdehSF3NVDksVI" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746 font-size-3">    &lt;/property&gt;</span></div>
<div class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-mKjdehSF3NVDksVI" data-author-name="幂幂"></div>
<div id="magicdomid586" class=""></div>
<div id="magicdomid587" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-jIWtL5CwStd3AHJF" data-author-name="幂幂"><strong><span class="author-3380746 font-size-3">Step 2. Redistribute Intermediate Table（重分布数据）</span></strong></div>
<div class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-jIWtL5CwStd3AHJF" data-author-name="幂幂"></div>
<div id="magicdomid588" class=""></div>
<div id="magicdomid589" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-Aoep3RlaMnnryexu" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746 font-size-3">在第一步完成后，Hive将抽取出的数据生成在指定的HDFS目录下；仔细观察发现，有的文件比较大，有的文件比较小甚至是空的。文件大小的不均衡，会导致后续的MR任务也不均衡：有的Map分到的文件块较大所以耗时较长，而有的分到的很小所以耗时较短，从而形成“木桶效应”。为消除这种不均衡，Kylin需要对临时表的数据做一次重新分布，希望借助这次重分布使得文件块的大小适中且基本一样大。下面是一次重分布的例子:</span></div>
<div class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-Aoep3RlaMnnryexu" data-author-name="幂幂"></div>
<div id="magicdomid590" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-baqSsCIRVUz4zPgo" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746 font-size-3"> </span></div>
<div id="magicdomid591" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-UieQx7cm8CefaOJk" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746 font-size-3">total input rows = 159869711</span></div>
<div id="magicdomid592" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-0gfWvcUxAcgfjKaj" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746 font-size-3">expected input rows per mapper = 1000000</span></div>
<div id="magicdomid593" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-PmCUNaaVaOadlVCX" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746 font-size-3">num reducers for RedistributeFlatHiveTableStep = 160</span></div>
<div id="magicdomid594" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-VgSTolIvDRiDAErm" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746 font-size-3"> </span></div>
<div id="magicdomid595" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-Otu4JH8HfydirBTV" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746 font-size-3">Redistribute table, cmd: </span></div>
<div id="magicdomid596" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-GwZdOZYZ0wJ9vlRw" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746 font-size-3"> </span></div>
<div id="magicdomid597" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-z8K22etkEijCXynY" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746 font-size-3">hive -e "USE default;</span></div>
<div id="magicdomid598" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-aCsRTCXCRPadapz6" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746 font-size-3">SET dfs.replication=2;</span></div>
<div id="magicdomid599" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-Zz8h9Q6hzDlFStdN" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746 font-size-3">SET hive.exec.compress.output=true;</span></div>
<div id="magicdomid600" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-PIym8i3jawmxOFnn" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746 font-size-3">SET hive.auto.convert.join.noconditionaltask=true;</span></div>
<div id="magicdomid601" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-qo32OKHU3euE5dtw" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746 font-size-3">SET hive.auto.convert.join.noconditionaltask.size=100000000;</span></div>
<div id="magicdomid602" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-0D2ZuFIM8GO1fGXD" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746 font-size-3">SET mapreduce.job.split.metainfo.maxsize=-1;</span></div>
<div id="magicdomid603" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-Ys79A2dNrFQnRsCF" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746 font-size-3">set mapreduce.job.reduces=160;</span></div>
<div id="magicdomid604" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-DlIsRVN80YSPLyeX" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746 font-size-3">set hive.merge.mapredfiles=false; </span></div>
<div id="magicdomid605" class=""></div>
<div id="magicdomid606" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-ldGhfpMT0ryvEFY7" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746 font-size-3">INSERT OVERWRITE TABLE kylin_intermediate_airline_cube_v3610f668a3cdb437e8373c034430f6c34 SELECT * FROM kylin_intermediate_airline_cube_v3610f668a3cdb437e8373c034430f6c34 DISTRIBUTE BY RAND();</span></div>
<div id="magicdomid607" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-gf6LZqFriomGyVSp" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746 font-size-3">"</span></div>
<div id="magicdomid608" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-3UlSjigiHUTm8sEx" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746 font-size-3"> </span></div>
<div class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-3UlSjigiHUTm8sEx" data-author-name="幂幂"></div>
<div id="magicdomid609" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-eIioJpdQboQcJWXk" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746 font-size-3">Kylin通过查询Hive获得临时表的行数，基于此行数计算出需要重分布的文件块数量。默认地Kylin会为每100万行数据分配一个文件。在此例中，临时表有接近1.6亿行数据，所以预计需要160个文件。通过在执行INSERT INTO … DISTRIBUTE BY 的重分布语句前设置“mapreduce.job.reduces=N”的方式，使用指定数量的reducer来接收数据；按照每个reducer写一个文件的惯例，从而得到指定数量的文件。在后续以此临时表为输入的MR处理中，Hadoop会启动与文件数相同的Map（通常100万行数据的大小不超过一个HDFS文件块）。通过这一步，既合并了小文件，也消除了木桶效应。</span></div>
<div id="magicdomid610" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-mSio7EpLhVBLgyUB" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746 font-size-3"> </span></div>
<div id="magicdomid611" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-BM9T59gktGh91e7l" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746 font-size-3">每个文件100万行的配置是一个经验值；如果您的数据规模较小，或Hadoop集群较大，可以分割更多的文件以获得更高的并发性：在conf/kylin.properties中设置特定参数，如：</span></div>
<div id="magicdomid612" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-ZXE5I8urtTZ4h4le" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746 font-size-3"> </span></div>
<div id="magicdomid613" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-1s4OoysWVpmKwDLI" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746 font-size-3">kylin.job.mapreduce.mapper.input.rows=500000</span></div>
<div id="magicdomid614" class=""></div>
<div id="magicdomid615" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-YoNYACieOWVSqgwe" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746 font-size-3">多数情况下，Kylin会让Hive随机地重分布数据；这时的重分布语句是 "DISTRIBUTE BY RAND()"。因为是随机，它会让数据分布的非常均匀，但是毫无规律。</span></div>
<div id="magicdomid616" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-QfEr0pxLyxM5V8OQ" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746 font-size-3"> </span></div>
<div id="magicdomid617" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-rhvThQiqDUV8NmOi" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746 font-size-3">如果您的Cube指定了一个“shard by”列的话，Kylin会让Hive按此列的值做重分布，而不再是随机分布。“Shard by”列的选择是在Cube的高级设置页，如图二所示，此列需要是一个高基数列如“USER_ID”）此时的重分布语句会变成："DISTRIBUTE BY USER_ID"。</span></div>
<div id="magicdomid618" class=""></div>
<div class=""></div>
<div id="magicdomid619" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-6x6TwFUy3kTg39et" data-author-name="幂幂"><img class="aligncenter wp-image-2867 size-full" src="https://kyligence.io/wp-content/uploads/2017/02/640-3.jpeg" alt="640-3" width="640" height="244" /></div>
<div class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-oPGWREy0GUHGh46F" data-author-name="幂幂"></div>
<div id="magicdomid620" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-oPGWREy0GUHGh46F" style="text-align: center;" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746 font-size-3">图三：选择Shard by列</span></div>
<div class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-oPGWREy0GUHGh46F" data-author-name="幂幂"></div>
<div class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-oPGWREy0GUHGh46F" data-author-name="幂幂"></div>
<div id="magicdomid621" class=""></div>
<div id="magicdomid622" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-SUbQWGNF13As7gvT" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746 font-size-3">按高基数维度列做重分布的好处是，具有相同此列值的行，将被归拢在同一个文件，从而非常利于后续的聚合计算：大量的聚合在本地完成，减少了数据的交叉传递。在一个典型场景中，这一优化使得Cube构建的时间减少了40%。</span></div>
<div id="magicdomid623" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-4oAl9w5AqnWLFskM" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746 font-size-3">  </span></div>
<div id="magicdomid624" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-qpxA61YFZas0vg1I" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746 font-size-3">请注意</span></div>
<div id="magicdomid625" class=""></div>
<div id="magicdomid626" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-2WzD3FYk3E09I9YT" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746 font-size-3">1) "shard by"列必须是一个高基数列，并且它会出现在很多cuboid中（而不是仅仅出现在少数cuboid中）；</span></div>
<div id="magicdomid627" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-QTOv9dpBGeSgTjlk" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746 font-size-3">2）此列在所有时间区间均有很多值可供均匀分布；典型的例子有: "USER_ID", "SELLER_ID", "PRODUCT", "CELL_NUMBER"等，基数至少在数千以上。</span></div>
<div id="magicdomid628" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-raA8rTMZJTHp0cE1" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746 font-size-3">3) 仅支持选择一个列做为”shard by”。</span></div>
<div id="magicdomid629" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-LerzbXKfOYEHsvsR" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746 font-size-3">4) 使用"shard by" 对于Cube的存储和查询也有益处，这里不做讨论。</span></div>
<div class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-LerzbXKfOYEHsvsR" data-author-name="幂幂"></div>
<div id="magicdomid630" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-H6mqGENHyitvjDqN" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746 font-size-3"> </span></div>
<div id="magicdomid631" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-QG113V3k2STKBRBX" data-author-name="幂幂"><strong><span class="author-3380746 font-size-3">Step 3. Extract Fact Table Distinct Columns （抽取各维度的不同值）</span></strong></div>
<div class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-QG113V3k2STKBRBX" data-author-name="幂幂"></div>
<div id="magicdomid632" class=""></div>
<div id="magicdomid633" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-ycP774Hv10V3rSpN" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746 font-size-3">在此步骤中，Kylin启动一个MR任务来获取各个维度在临时表中出现的不同值，用于构建维度字典（dictionary）。 </span></div>
<div id="magicdomid634" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-AUeNtnXVuypHlfm2" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746 font-size-3"> </span></div>
<div id="magicdomid635" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-Rt76s1VTOJktIT9b" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746 font-size-3">实际上此步骤做了更多事情：它模拟Cube的构建并使用HyperLogLog计数器来估算每个cuboid的行数，从而收集Cube的统计数据。这些统计数据将在后续的任务中辅助Kylin 采取不同的策略和配置，而且还可以帮助用户后续分析等。</span></div>
<div id="magicdomid636" class=""></div>
<div id="magicdomid637" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-vgQZjAxc71bu3UkQ" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746 font-size-3">在这一步中如果您发现Map任务非常慢，通常它说明Cube的设计过于复杂，如有太多维度、太多组合等，请参考 [优化Cube设计] (</span><span class="author-3380746 font-size-3 url"><a href="https://kylin.apache.org/docs16/howto/howto_optimize_cubes.html)">https://kylin.apache.org/docs16/howto/howto_optimize_cubes.html)</a></span><span class="author-3380746 font-size-3"> 来为Cube瘦身。如果Reduce任务总是报OutOfMemory 错误，说明Cube组合数过多，或者默认的YARN内存分配过少。如果通过调整集群设置等方法依然不能在合理时间内完成此步骤，那么您可以及早停止并深入调查问题，因为后续的构建将比这一步更加耗时。</span></div>
<div id="magicdomid638" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-ikuYrpgGOOf8K6zI" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746 font-size-3"> </span></div>
<div id="magicdomid639" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-VPerJvsAbGw4kJxd" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746 font-size-3">当然您还可以通过修改配置来降低此步的数据采样率，从而使得效率提升，但并不推荐这样做因为它会降低统计的准确性.  </span></div>
<div class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-VPerJvsAbGw4kJxd" data-author-name="幂幂"></div>
<div id="magicdomid640" class=""></div>
<div id="magicdomid641" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-d623eejrln6W4Uwp" data-author-name="幂幂"><strong><span class="author-3380746 font-size-3">Step 4. Build Dimension Dictionary（构建维度字典）</span></strong></div>
<div class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-d623eejrln6W4Uwp" data-author-name="幂幂"></div>
<div id="magicdomid642" class=""></div>
<div id="magicdomid643" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-jjsrEVbTSt158Hhy" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746 font-size-3">在上一步完成后，每个采用字典编码的维度，在此临时表中出现的不同值将被抽取在单个文件中。在此步中，Kylin会以读取这些值并在任务引擎节点的内存中构建字典（从下一版开始Kylin会将此任务移至MR）。通常此步骤会在数秒中完成；但是如果有超高基数（大于一百万）维度­，Kylin可能会报"Too high cardinality is not suitable for dictionary"的信息，建议用户对超高基数维度采用非字典编码，如"fixed_length", "integer"等。对编码的设置也是在Cube的“高级设置”页完成，参考图三。</span></div>
<div class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-jjsrEVbTSt158Hhy" data-author-name="幂幂"></div>
<div id="magicdomid644" class=""></div>
<div id="magicdomid645" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-sbHytsIv8BuwyYUR" data-author-name="幂幂"><strong><span class="author-3380746 font-size-3">Step 5. Save Cuboid Statistics（保存Cuboid统计信息）</span></strong></div>
<div class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-sbHytsIv8BuwyYUR" data-author-name="幂幂"></div>
<div id="magicdomid646" class=""></div>
<div id="magicdomid647" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-aLLCpXk4wn6LcDXl" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746 font-size-3">将采集的各个cuboid的统计信息保存至Kylin的元数据存储，供后续使用。</span></div>
<div class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-aLLCpXk4wn6LcDXl" data-author-name="幂幂"></div>
<div id="magicdomid648" class=""></div>
<div id="magicdomid649" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-eT72gy3AO2t1pe9A" data-author-name="幂幂"><strong><span class="author-3380746 font-size-3">Step 6. Create HTable（创建HTable）</span></strong></div>
<div class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-eT72gy3AO2t1pe9A" data-author-name="幂幂"></div>
<div id="magicdomid650" class=""></div>
<div id="magicdomid651" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-FYDq2uE67kq8lu7S" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746 font-size-3">依据统计信息为当前构建的segment创建HBase table； 这一步以及上一步都是轻量级任务故很快可以完成。</span></div>
<div class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-FYDq2uE67kq8lu7S" data-author-name="幂幂"></div>
<div id="magicdomid652" class=""></div>
<div id="magicdomid653" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-p9CJIBZajOtg9Lcw" data-author-name="幂幂"><strong><span class="author-3380746 font-size-3">Step 7. Build Base Cuboid（构建Base Base Cuboid）</span></strong></div>
<div class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-p9CJIBZajOtg9Lcw" data-author-name="幂幂"></div>
<div id="magicdomid654" class=""></div>
<div id="magicdomid655" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-voCn2KymkD9RowlC" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746 font-size-3">这是“逐层”(by-layer) Cube构建的第一轮MR任务，它以临时表（即图四中的“full data”）为输入，计算包含所有维度的组合（称为base cuboid），也就是下图中的4-D cuboid。</span></div>
<div class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-voCn2KymkD9RowlC" data-author-name="幂幂"></div>
<div id="magicdomid656" class=""></div>
<div id="magicdomid657" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-J0zyNl8c335rJgIX" data-author-name="幂幂"><img class="aligncenter wp-image-2869 size-full" src="https://kyligence.io/wp-content/uploads/2017/02/640-4.jpeg" alt="640-4" width="640" height="393" /></div>
<div class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-w1YctkkmSsTIbdkK" data-author-name="幂幂"></div>
<div id="magicdomid658" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-w1YctkkmSsTIbdkK" style="text-align: center;" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746 font-size-3">图四：逐层构建四维Cube的过程</span></div>
<div class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-w1YctkkmSsTIbdkK" data-author-name="幂幂"></div>
<div id="magicdomid659" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-af5hxNTilVvXJStE" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746 font-size-3"> </span></div>
<div id="magicdomid660" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-pTw4Wcv0ggibjZkZ" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746 font-size-3">此任务的map数等于步骤2的reduce数量， 此任务的reduce数量是基于Cube统计出的此任务的output大小而估算的：默认为每500MB的输出分配一个reduce；如果您观察到此步骤的reduce数量较小，可以考虑在conf/kylin.properties中修改默认参数以获得更多reduce同时运行， 如: </span></div>
<div id="magicdomid661" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-ojH1jD3GLtDvmxzZ" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746 font-size-3"> </span></div>
<div id="magicdomid662" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-Ozm5Zdba0r1B8xFD" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746 font-size-3">kylin.job.mapreduce.default.reduce.input.mb=200</span></div>
<div id="magicdomid663" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-Uu7A8r0WcvyZFS5A" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746 font-size-3"> </span></div>
<div id="magicdomid664" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-vdfGp0p3kKwVQmxJ" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746 font-size-3">如果配置某些MR参数可以对任务有帮助的话，您可以将参数添加到conf/kylin_job_conf.xml中以供所有”逐层”构建任务所使用；如果需要为不同Cube设置不同MR参数值，可以在创建Cube的“参数覆盖”页，使用前缀kylin.job.mr.config.override.进行配置，如：</span></div>
<div class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-vdfGp0p3kKwVQmxJ" data-author-name="幂幂"></div>
<div id="magicdomid665" class=""></div>
<div id="magicdomid666" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-QK5RSqKVwb6N2bpw" data-author-name="幂幂"><img class="aligncenter wp-image-2871 size-full" src="https://kyligence.io/wp-content/uploads/2017/02/640-5.jpeg" alt="640-5" width="640" height="180" /></div>
<div id="magicdomid667" class=""></div>
<div class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-1kSdpNObTn7tG8Ct" data-author-name="幂幂"></div>
<div id="magicdomid668" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-1kSdpNObTn7tG8Ct" style="text-align: center;" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746 font-size-3">图五：在Cube上覆盖MR配置参数</span></div>
<div id="magicdomid669" class=""></div>
<div class=""></div>
<div id="magicdomid670" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-O0dIoDeootHoaOeE" data-author-name="幂幂"><strong><span class="author-3380746 font-size-3">Step 8. Build N-Dimension Cuboid（构建N-维Cuboid）</span></strong></div>
<div id="magicdomid671" class=""></div>
<div class=""></div>
<div id="magicdomid672" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-oxI5TCeHRyosjl5e" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746 font-size-3">这是“逐层” Cube构建的其它轮MR任务，每一轮以上一轮的输出为输入，然后减去一个维度生成新的组合，并在reduce中聚合以生成子Cuboid。例如，以ABCD组合为输入，减去维度A生成BCD组合，减去维度B生成ACD组合。 </span></div>
<div id="magicdomid673" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-hY56tnaRQ9C7BEUD" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746 font-size-3"> </span></div>
<div id="magicdomid674" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-HroVI5OQmGT7T00H" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746 font-size-3">有些维度组合可以从多个父亲组合来生成，在这种情况下，Kylin会选择ID值“最小”的那个父亲组合来生成。例如，组合AB可以从ABC（id: 1110）生成，也可以从ABD（id: 1101）生成，由于1101 &lt; 1110, 所以ABD会被用来生成AB。基于此规则，如果维度D的基数很小，那么此时的聚合量将会很少，也就更加高效。图六介绍了一个四维度Cube的Cuboid生成树。</span></div>
<div class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-HroVI5OQmGT7T00H" data-author-name="幂幂"></div>
<div id="magicdomid675" class=""></div>
<div id="magicdomid676" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-g4XsXiCZxbl3sYPR" data-author-name="幂幂"><img class="aligncenter wp-image-2873 size-full" src="https://kyligence.io/wp-content/uploads/2017/02/640-6.jpeg" alt="640-6" width="640" height="364" /></div>
<div class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-PJ7kbMQJ3uRPgiaP" data-author-name="幂幂"></div>
<div id="magicdomid677" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-PJ7kbMQJ3uRPgiaP" style="text-align: center;" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746 font-size-3">图六：四维Cube的生成树</span></div>
<div id="magicdomid678" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-Km2hdLDSHmnszh26" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746 font-size-3"> </span></div>
<div class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-Km2hdLDSHmnszh26" data-author-name="幂幂"></div>
<div id="magicdomid679" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-3fU9zMqaHBjX1MBK" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746 font-size-3">因此，当您设计Cube的时候，在高级设置页面，请将低基数维度，尽量拖动放置在高基数维度的后面 。这个原则不仅会使得Cube构建更快，也会使得查询时的后聚合性能更好 。</span></div>
<div id="magicdomid680" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-F6OF0k3MxXl42649" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746 font-size-3"> </span></div>
<div id="magicdomid681" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-PGlllgpegzaoN15X" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746 font-size-3">通常从N-维到 (N/2)-维的计算比较慢，因为这是一个数据爆炸的过程：N-维有1个 Cuboid，(N-1)-维有 N个 cuboid， (N-2)-维 有N*(N-1)个 cuboid，以此类推。在 (N/2)-维之后，组合数是一个相反的过程，并且每个cuboid的行数较少，因此每步的时间逐渐缩短。</span></div>
<div class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-PGlllgpegzaoN15X" data-author-name="幂幂"></div>
<div id="magicdomid682" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-MpO537jgWrPr9DGA" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746 font-size-3"> </span></div>
<div id="magicdomid683" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-kJ4ExUqN8MFBZkLL" data-author-name="幂幂"><strong><span class="author-3380746 font-size-3">Step 9. Build Cube(使用in-mem算法构建Cube)</span></strong></div>
<div class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-kJ4ExUqN8MFBZkLL" data-author-name="幂幂"></div>
<div id="magicdomid684" class=""></div>
<div id="magicdomid685" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-pm9EwhmZeBX2y4yv" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746 font-size-3">这一步是采用Kylin的“in-mem” 算法来构建Cube，它仅需一轮MR即可完成所有组合的计算，但它需要使用较多的计算资源。Kylin目录下的 conf/kylin_job_conf_inmem.xml配置文件就是为这一步任务而添加的；默认它会为每个Map任务向Hadoop请求3GB内存；如果您的集群内存资源较充足，可以修改配置以分配更多内存，这样Kylin在计算时可以更多地使用内存来缓存数据，减少磁盘的读写，从而提升构建性能；例如:</span></div>
<div id="magicdomid686" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-kV4L4kLUdInfVscf" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746 font-size-3"> </span></div>
<div id="magicdomid687" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-jj9m7hEWHxIST0AI" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746 font-size-3">    &lt;property&gt;</span></div>
<div id="magicdomid688" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-H5GgDWUn4bF0GLwP" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746 font-size-3">        &lt;name&gt;mapreduce.map.memory.mb&lt;/name&gt;</span></div>
<div id="magicdomid689" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-WTddNxE5HVOi7CbS" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746 font-size-3">        &lt;value&gt;6144&lt;/value&gt;</span></div>
<div id="magicdomid690" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-sHKJmyOY2rk4XRtP" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746 font-size-3">        &lt;description&gt;&lt;/description&gt;</span></div>
<div id="magicdomid691" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-on0agub2LBNQjFUL" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746 font-size-3">    &lt;/property&gt;</span></div>
<div id="magicdomid692" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-JbRpFQrffUfeSDzE" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746 font-size-3">    </span></div>
<div id="magicdomid693" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-7DDJRoel6k0Te7gh" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746 font-size-3">    &lt;property&gt;</span></div>
<div id="magicdomid694" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-MGNrKNLdClhsDmYV" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746 font-size-3">        &lt;name&gt;mapreduce.map.java.opts&lt;/name&gt;</span></div>
<div id="magicdomid695" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-C5QinRX6rdTUHY1V" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746 font-size-3">        &lt;value&gt;-Xmx5632m&lt;/value&gt;</span></div>
<div id="magicdomid696" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-GCBFWJXami4LcBSX" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746 font-size-3">        &lt;description&gt;&lt;/description&gt;</span></div>
<div id="magicdomid697" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-9QoLPcTks70muaB6" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746 font-size-3">    &lt;/property&gt;</span></div>
<div id="magicdomid698" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-mBWDsAGBeqTOFujG" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746 font-size-3"> </span></div>
<div id="magicdomid699" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-QV6UFzS05ZdpV0cQ" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746 font-size-3">如果需要为不同Cube设置不同MR参数值，也可以使用与图五相同的方法。</span></div>
<div id="magicdomid700" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-WiFP8gtqcyOPLVg4" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746 font-size-3">请注意：“in-mem” 算法和“by-layer”算法各有优劣；在有些情况下“in-mem”算法反而会慢。通常不建议用户自行设置算法，Kylin会根据Cube的统计信息选择更合适的算法；没有选中的算法的步骤会被跳过。 </span></div>
<div id="magicdomid701" class=""></div>
<div class=""></div>
<div class=""></div>
<div id="magicdomid702" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-e3rlC0u79ZdpZJeV" data-author-name="幂幂"><strong><span class="author-3380746 font-size-3">Step 10. Convert Cuboid Data to HFile(生成HFile)</span></strong></div>
<div class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-e3rlC0u79ZdpZJeV" data-author-name="幂幂"></div>
<div id="magicdomid703" class=""></div>
<div id="magicdomid704" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-yYogIFjOK7YkaKjg" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746 font-size-3">此步骤启动一个MR任务，将前面计算好的cuboid文件（sequence文件格式）转换成HBase的HFile格式。Kylin会根据Cube统计信息，计算并预先分配好region；默认会为每5GB的数据分配一个region，然后再为每个region分配合适数量的HFile。MR的reduce数量等于HFile文件的数量。通常region数越多，这一步的并发度就越高；如果您观察到这一步的耗时较长，且reduce数量较少的话，可以在conf/kylin.properties中将下列参数的值设置的更小以获得更好性能，例如：</span></div>
<div id="magicdomid705" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-cTZRtlDNMprlKJkK" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746 font-size-3"> </span></div>
<div id="magicdomid706" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-ysoAbK6Y2l4cvchu" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746 font-size-3">kylin.hbase.region.cut=2</span></div>
<div id="magicdomid707" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-L2Bym3FNc30BN8C1" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746 font-size-3">kylin.hbase.hfile.size.gb=1</span></div>
<div id="magicdomid708" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-ihxVdvwOff1JdNBn" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746 font-size-3"> </span></div>
<div id="magicdomid709" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-id63XXiNz8dgjwwK" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746 font-size-3">如果不确定您的集群中HBase合适的region大小，可以咨询HBase管理员。 </span></div>
<div class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-id63XXiNz8dgjwwK" data-author-name="幂幂"></div>
<div id="magicdomid710" class=""></div>
<div id="magicdomid711" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-2X9d986WpnwN6KKh" data-author-name="幂幂"><strong><span class="author-3380746 font-size-3">Step 11. Load HFile to HBase Table(加载HFile到HBase)</span></strong></div>
<div class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-2X9d986WpnwN6KKh" data-author-name="幂幂"></div>
<div id="magicdomid712" class=""></div>
<div id="magicdomid713" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-CftPzkEH5wMtq6bT" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746 font-size-3">在这步中Kylin使用 HBase API将生成好的 HFile通过BulkLoad的方式加载到HBase的 region server中；通常这一步很快即可完成。</span></div>
<div class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-CftPzkEH5wMtq6bT" data-author-name="幂幂"></div>
<div id="magicdomid714" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-r5ZwtseHUrBcrFVL" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746 font-size-3"> </span></div>
<div id="magicdomid715" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-OwW06SEVeFOBrWhq" data-author-name="幂幂"><strong><span class="author-3380746 font-size-3">Step 12. Update Cube Info(更新Cube信息)</span></strong></div>
<div class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-OwW06SEVeFOBrWhq" data-author-name="幂幂"></div>
<div id="magicdomid716" class=""></div>
<div id="magicdomid717" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-dFkz28JudUjFbs5t" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746 font-size-3">在Cube数据加载到HBase后，Kylin将此次构建的Cube segment的状态，从”NEW”更新成”READY”，标记此segment可以供查询引擎使用。</span></div>
<div class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-dFkz28JudUjFbs5t" data-author-name="幂幂"></div>
<div id="magicdomid718" class=""></div>
<div id="magicdomid719" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-XaTxzq9CmEV8W33G" data-author-name="幂幂"><strong><span class="author-3380746 font-size-3">Step 13. Cleanup(清理)</span></strong></div>
<div class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-XaTxzq9CmEV8W33G" data-author-name="幂幂"></div>
<div id="magicdomid720" class=""></div>
<div id="magicdomid721" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-fmyGQsoBAU4pTsf7" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746 font-size-3">这是收尾的步骤，会删除第一步生成的临时表；到这里它已经不会影响其它任何任务，因为segment已经变成了READY状态。即便此步骤出错也不用担心，其后当运行[StorageCleanupJob] (</span><span class="author-3380746 font-size-3 url"><a href="https://kylin.apache.org/docs16/howto/howto_cleanup_storage.html)%E7%9A%84%E6%97%B6%E5%80%99">https://kylin.apache.org/docs16/howto/howto_cleanup_storage.html)的时候</a></span><span class="author-3380746 font-size-3">，垃圾文件会被清。</span></div>
<div id="magicdomid722" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-Kd9MDDngIr8EF5SP" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746 font-size-3"> </span></div>
<div class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-Kd9MDDngIr8EF5SP" data-author-name="幂幂"></div>
<div id="magicdomid723" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-U7mLTXytAkpobDQm" data-author-name="幂幂"><strong><span class="author-3380746 font-size-3">小结</span></strong></div>
<div id="magicdomid724" class=""></div>
<div class=""></div>
<div id="magicdomid725" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-9PG3tSQmzMWykZjq" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746 font-size-3">关于Kylin的优化有很多手段和技巧，需要理论结合实际多多练习。如果您有经验想要分享，欢迎订阅并参与Kylin开发群组的讨论： [dev@kylin.apache.org](</span><span class="author-3380746 font-size-3 url"><a href="mailto:dev@kylin.apache.org)">mailto:dev@kylin.apache.org)</a></span><span class="author-3380746 font-size-3">.</span></div>
<div class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-9PG3tSQmzMWykZjq" data-author-name="幂幂"></div>]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>

	</item>
	<item>
		<title>【技术帖】如何参与到Apache开源社区（以Apache Kylin为例）</title>
		<link>http://kyligence.io/2017/02/2836/</link>
		<pubDate>Fri, 17 Feb 2017 08:36:24 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[tianyu]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://kyligence.io/?p=2836</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<div id="magicdomid732" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-LoyOZ5z86IlEJSNu" data-author-name="幂幂">目前我们开发者使用的很多软件都是开源软件，Apache社区虽然很活跃，但是还是有很多开发者对于如何参与到Apache社区去讨论项目不是很了解，可能一时没找到入口，这篇文章通过介绍如何加入Apache Kylin社区，期望可以和大家一起共同贡献开源社区，推动开源软件发展。</div>
<div id="magicdomid738" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-zjEys1trlta91VPO" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746 font-size-3">——仲俭</span></div>
<div class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-zjEys1trlta91VPO" data-author-name="幂幂">

<hr />

</div>
<div id="magicdomid740" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-YjBwUfdhA8RrBbij" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746 font-size-3"> </span></div>
<div id="magicdomid741" class=""> <span class="author-3380746 font-size-3">开源社区又称开放源代码社区。开源社区为广大开发者们提供了一个自有学习交流的空间，也成了他们之间的沟通桥梁。在实际工作和生活中，我们已经享受了很多来自开源界的福利。越来越多的开发者对于如何加入到开源社区充满了兴趣和渴望。</span></div>
<div id="magicdomid743" class=""></div>
<div id="magicdomid744" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-lXE9jjpxkKAJ0EcD" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746 font-size-3">今天Kyligence 技术合伙人 &amp; 高级软件工程师仲俭，以介绍如何加入Apache Kylin社区为契机，和大家分享如何参与开源社区。</span></div>
<div id="magicdomid745" class=""></div>
<div class=""></div>
<div id="magicdomid746" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-tEu7KY27lJuUWFUr" data-author-name="幂幂"><strong><span class="author-3380746 font-size-3">引言</span></strong></div>
<div class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-tEu7KY27lJuUWFUr" data-author-name="幂幂"></div>
<div id="magicdomid747" class=""></div>
<div id="magicdomid748" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-TGXsxZMqHYEhQtFJ" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746 font-size-3">目前大数据领域的Apache Hadoop，Apache Spark，Apache Kafka，Apache Kylin等。试想一下这些软件让我们自己开发，不管是个人还是公司都是很难实现或者需要投入大量人力的事情。</span></div>
<div id="magicdomid749" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-LybK25LYDkl3oUJP" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746 font-size-3"> </span></div>
<div id="magicdomid750" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-hYlbrmFki0pkNnWq" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746 font-size-3">Apache软件基金会是专门为支持开源软件项目而办的一个非盈利性组织。一般项目贡献到Apache都有严格的流程。在此不深入讨论。Apache旗下项目虽然上百个，其中Apache Kylin是目前唯一一个由纯华人团队贡献到Apache社区并顺利孵化成为顶级项目，主要通过预计算技术实现对万亿级别的数据的多维分析达到秒级响应。可通过官网 </span><span class="author-3380746 font-size-3 url"><a href="http://kylin.apache.org/">http://kylin.apache.org/</a></span><span class="author-3380746 font-size-3"> 了解更多。 </span></div>
<div id="magicdomid751" class=""></div>
<div class=""></div>
<div id="magicdomid752" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-FdNIApjYjnkrVvKa" data-author-name="幂幂"><strong><span class="author-3380746 font-size-3">为什么要参与到社区</span></strong></div>
<div class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-FdNIApjYjnkrVvKa" data-author-name="幂幂"></div>
<div id="magicdomid753" class=""></div>
<div id="magicdomid754" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-YgYza7UYDX2mMjRm" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746 font-size-3">我们目前国内很多开发者比较喜欢在QQ，微信群等交流技术，这本身没什么问题，简单直接，但是经常会有人问问题很久没人回答，最最常见的是今天一个人问一个问题，明天又有另一个人问同样的问题，效率不是很高。</span></div>
<div id="magicdomid755" class=""></div>
<div class=""></div>
<div id="magicdomid756" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-5QR7cmdGKD8fIJKZ" data-author-name="幂幂"><strong><span class="author-3380746 font-size-3">以Apache Kylin为例</span></strong></div>
<div class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-5QR7cmdGKD8fIJKZ" data-author-name="幂幂"></div>
<div id="magicdomid757" class=""></div>
<div id="magicdomid758" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-NNwBgowLl5TdqkqF" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746 font-size-3">Apache下面的每一个项目都有自己的邮件列表，同时分不同的邮件组，以Apache Kylin为例，有如下订阅列表</span></div>
<div class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-NNwBgowLl5TdqkqF" data-author-name="幂幂"></div>
<div id="magicdomid759" class="font-size-3 gutter-author-3380746 list-div locate lineguid-vDaHxEEkwStERvvU" data-author-name="幂幂">
<ul class="list-bullet1">
	<li><span class="author-3380746 font-size-3">user-subscribe@kylin.apache.org  订阅该邮件可以参与讨论普通用户遇到的问题</span></li>
</ul>
</div>
<div id="magicdomid760" class="font-size-3 gutter-author-3380746 list-div locate lineguid-tLqATD9K2HfBN6kD" data-author-name="幂幂">
<ul class="list-bullet1">
	<li><span class="author-3380746 font-size-3">dev-subscribe@kylin.apache.org   订阅该邮件可以参与讨论开发者遇到的问题，开发者比较常用这个邮件列表</span></li>
</ul>
</div>
<div id="magicdomid761" class="font-size-3 gutter-author-3380746 list-div locate lineguid-y2f06DMloauBpgvK" data-author-name="幂幂">
<ul class="list-bullet1">
	<li><span class="author-3380746 font-size-3">issues-subscribe@kylin.apache.org 订阅该邮件可以收到所有jira的创建和更新</span></li>
</ul>
</div>
<div id="magicdomid762" class="font-size-3 gutter-author-3380746 list-div locate lineguid-AfbYQf2y32Dng41S" data-author-name="幂幂">
<ul class="list-bullet1">
	<li><span class="author-3380746 font-size-3">commits-subscribe@kylin.apache.org 所有的代码的提交变动信息都会发到该邮件 </span></li>
</ul>
</div>
<div id="magicdomid763" class=""></div>
<div id="magicdomid764" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-KatWhAcHlH4MYQYN" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746 font-size-3">这里以订阅开发者邮件列表为例:</span></div>
<div id="magicdomid765" class=""></div>
<div id="magicdomid766" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-XS2eGdez6wJMu03r" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746 font-size-3">首先，用你自己的邮件给 dev-subscribe@kylin.apache.org 发一封邮件，内容或标题不是特别影响。</span></div>
<div class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-XS2eGdez6wJMu03r" data-author-name="幂幂"></div>
<div class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-XS2eGdez6wJMu03r" data-author-name="幂幂"></div>
<div id="magicdomid767" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-Nw94SOMcDovbMkn2" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746 font-size-3 upload-image img-kCSsfUnQCZndLeG9 "><img class="aligncenter wp-image-2878 size-full" src="https://kyligence.io/wp-content/uploads/2017/02/640-2.png" alt="640-2" width="542" height="231" /></span></div>
<div class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-Nw94SOMcDovbMkn2" data-author-name="幂幂"></div>
<div class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-Nw94SOMcDovbMkn2" data-author-name="幂幂"></div>
<div id="magicdomid768" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-2xrpxneHgaXSsoMt" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746 font-size-3">然后你会收到一封确认邮件，直接点击回复该邮件，写点内容表示确认即可。</span></div>
<div class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-2xrpxneHgaXSsoMt" data-author-name="幂幂"></div>
<div class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-2xrpxneHgaXSsoMt" data-author-name="幂幂"></div>
<div id="magicdomid769" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-s5RprIXZ4u1x9mvA" data-author-name="幂幂"><img class="aligncenter wp-image-2880 size-full" src="https://kyligence.io/wp-content/uploads/2017/02/640-7.jpeg" alt="640-7" width="525" height="449" /></div>
<div class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-s5RprIXZ4u1x9mvA" data-author-name="幂幂"></div>
<div class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-yvKg4cMKDvuwYfEs" data-author-name="幂幂"></div>
<div id="magicdomid770" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-yvKg4cMKDvuwYfEs" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746 font-size-3">确认后，你会收到一封欢迎邮件。</span></div>
<div class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-yvKg4cMKDvuwYfEs" data-author-name="幂幂"></div>
<div class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-yvKg4cMKDvuwYfEs" data-author-name="幂幂"></div>
<div id="magicdomid771" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-CXBlpIXWqE2RDr86" data-author-name="幂幂"><img class="aligncenter wp-image-2882 size-full" src="https://kyligence.io/wp-content/uploads/2017/02/640-8.jpeg" alt="640-8" width="640" height="434" /></div>
<div class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-NH5NE449eEtvKAsQ" data-author-name="幂幂"></div>
<div class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-NH5NE449eEtvKAsQ" data-author-name="幂幂"></div>
<div id="magicdomid772" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-NH5NE449eEtvKAsQ" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746 font-size-3">以后你就可以收到所有关于Apache Kylin 开发的讨论信息了，官方默认语言为英语，不过英文不好的也不要有压力，技术性的单词基本敲出来就好，都能理解，不行的话发中文一样会有回复。也是个锻炼英文的好地方。</span></div>
<div id="magicdomid773" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-C5zsgOwFEqGToIF5" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746 font-size-3">在这里你可以跟Apache Kylin核心开发者进行交流讨论。得到的回复一定是最准确的回复，所有的讨论信息都会被存档。所以在你提出问题之前，请先搜一下看是否已经有人遇到过并且得到回复。</span></div>
<div id="magicdomid774" class=""></div>
<div class=""></div>
<div id="magicdomid775" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-wDW8bJukP4dO46Cr" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746 font-size-3">存档地址</span></div>
<div id="magicdomid776" class=""></div>
<div class=""></div>
<div id="magicdomid777" class="font-size-3 gutter-author-3380746 list-div locate lineguid-oIbkXCQvkjMqlgHX" data-author-name="幂幂">
<ul class="list-bullet1">
	<li><span class="author-3380746 font-size-3">开发交流存档</span></li>
</ul>
</div>
<div id="magicdomid778" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-tDYUvVx7eysYQQM2" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746 font-size-3 url"><a href="https://www.mail-archive.com/dev@kylin.apache.org/">https://www.mail-archive.com/dev@kylin.apache.org/</a></span></div>
<div id="magicdomid779" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-p3A4eHJMnsqhS7hN" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746 font-size-3">或</span><span class="author-3380746 font-size-3 url"><a href="http://apache-kylin.74782.x6.nabble.com/">http://apache-kylin.74782.x6.nabble.com/</a></span></div>
<div class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-p3A4eHJMnsqhS7hN" data-author-name="幂幂"></div>
<div id="magicdomid780" class="font-size-3 gutter-author-3380746 list-div locate lineguid-mtJXPPpw3H5TJ6jd" data-author-name="幂幂">
<ul class="list-bullet1">
	<li><span class="author-3380746 font-size-3">JIRA更新存档</span></li>
</ul>
</div>
<div id="magicdomid781" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-bL9BN6EFbSwZKIBu" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746 font-size-3 url"><a href="https://www.mail-archive.com/issues@kylin.apache.org/">https://www.mail-archive.com/issues@kylin.apache.org/</a></span></div>
<div class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-bL9BN6EFbSwZKIBu" data-author-name="幂幂"></div>
<div id="magicdomid782" class="font-size-3 gutter-author-3380746 list-div locate lineguid-wBQJiRYv2tKdyNnu" data-author-name="幂幂">
<ul class="list-bullet1">
	<li><span class="author-3380746 font-size-3">普通用户交流存档</span></li>
</ul>
</div>
<div id="magicdomid783" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-fscceZtJEwVAfFJV" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746 font-size-3 url"><a href="https://www.mail-archive.com/user@kylin.apache.org/">https://www.mail-archive.com/user@kylin.apache.org/</a></span><span class="author-3380746 font-size-3"> </span></div>
<div class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-fscceZtJEwVAfFJV" data-author-name="幂幂"></div>
<div id="magicdomid784" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-S4O8nChvApoZUcpB" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746 font-size-3"> </span></div>
<div id="magicdomid785" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-eEYYvK8Qipb4hM1n" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746 font-size-3">Jira管理</span></div>
<div id="magicdomid786" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-HCY1RxCBrZhjhvyd" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746 font-size-3"> </span></div>
<div id="magicdomid787" class=""></div>
<div id="magicdomid788" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-aAmaQhGstF0YjfXP" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746 font-size-3">另外，Kylin 通过Jira管理所有的开发计划，包括Bug，新功能，各个版本的计划都在jira中能看到。</span></div>
<div id="magicdomid789" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-ZmHFInHZGlZApcNK" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746 font-size-3 url"><a href="https://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/Dashboard.jspa">https://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/Dashboard.jspa</a></span></div>
<div id="magicdomid790" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-xrPfoTfRpFRz60J8" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746 font-size-3">在Projects下选中Kylin即可看到所有Kylin信息</span></div>
<div class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-xrPfoTfRpFRz60J8" data-author-name="幂幂"></div>
<div class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-xrPfoTfRpFRz60J8" data-author-name="幂幂"></div>
<div id="magicdomid791" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-vphkNqZwtdg7DyrL" data-author-name="幂幂"><img class="aligncenter wp-image-2884 size-full" src="https://kyligence.io/wp-content/uploads/2017/02/640-9.jpeg" alt="640-9" width="640" height="314" /></div>
<div class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-TK1KEOQXRtizfI7M" data-author-name="幂幂"></div>
<div class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-TK1KEOQXRtizfI7M" data-author-name="幂幂"></div>
<div id="magicdomid792" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-TK1KEOQXRtizfI7M" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746 font-size-3">如果你发现了Bug或者有好的需求可以在这里创建一个jira，让开发者知道。或者如果你感兴趣的话，可以把自己的代码打成patch以附件的形式提交到jira。会有人专门review，并跟你一起讨论，欢迎一起参与到开源社区。让你的代码帮到更多人！</span></div>
<div class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-TK1KEOQXRtizfI7M" data-author-name="幂幂"></div>]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>

	<item>
		<title>【活动预告】当Apache Kylin v2.0遇上OSC源创会</title>
		<link>http://kyligence.io/2017/02/2839/</link>
		<pubDate>Fri, 17 Feb 2017 08:50:06 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[tianyu]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://kyligence.io/?p=2839</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<div id="magicdomid796" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-t9cn4wky2o5w7Soj" data-author-name="幂幂"></div>
<div id="magicdomid798" class="gutter-author-3380746 hrline" data-author-name="幂幂"></div>
<div id="magicdomid799" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-xnqFySOefWOTSLa2" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746 font-size-3">OSC源创会开场啦，Kyligence此次不仅是特约合作伙伴，还诚意满满的准备了技术干货和大家分享。最重要的是，我们准备了10张源创会的门票，免费赠送给有兴趣的小伙伴哦。</span></div>
<div id="magicdomid800" class=""></div>
<div id="magicdomid801" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-cHg3MODBnkd3lYbR" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746 upload-image img-nKqMEd6bCamjoCr7  "><img src="http://mmbiz.qpic.cn/mmbiz_jpg/5caYppSDlUWrSp7svTrWQLO0jickg9YohROjjPT4jkibpibEGIoDP1EAr5otOYNTcbB1oZGKgPibKuLzPttRqrPpCg/640?wx_fmt=jpeg&amp;wxfrom=5&amp;wx_lazy=1" alt="" /></span></div>
<div id="magicdomid802" class=""></div>
<div id="magicdomid803" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-Oc54MqMQSqeit78J" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746">喜大普奔，由开源中国举办的开发者盛会---OSC源创会又开场啦。“源创会”是开源中国社区主办的一个会员线下技术互动和分享活动，主要面向一线开发者，关注开源，关注创新和技术发展潮流，讲求技术分享。</span></div>
<div id="magicdomid804" class=""></div>
<div id="magicdomid805" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-cSaTyuVzl8x0peEU" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746">2017年的首秀将在厦门和福州举行。作为一场面向技术开发者的开源技术盛会，现场云集了众多CTO、CIO、架构师、项目经理、程序员、运维人员等技术从业者。</span></div>
<div id="magicdomid806" class=""></div>
<div id="magicdomid807" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-6neidzSSHyj4cvaZ" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746">Kyligence技术合伙人兼高级软件架构师--李栋，将受邀参会并作为嘉宾和大家分享一个好消息：Apache Kylin v2.0即将发布！并将为大家讲述Apache Kylin v2.0带来的最新特性，以及它们背后的技术架构和设计理念。</span></div>
<div id="magicdomid808" class=""></div>
<div id="magicdomid809" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-FyAn6sxsBDdbR1MH" data-author-name="幂幂"><strong><span class="author-3380746">Kyligence在源创会</span></strong></div>
<div id="magicdomid810" class=""></div>
<div id="magicdomid811" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-rRiwjIzfyQZs7EYL" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746">分享议题：《Apache Kylin 2.0 - 从传统OLAP到实时数据仓库》</span></div>
<div id="magicdomid812" class=""></div>
<div id="magicdomid813" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-8UhQtbjuIhzMWsNN" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746 mention:user-Helvetica Neue'- Helvetica">现在的Apache Kylin羽翼更丰：支持雪花模型、更加全面的SQL语法、初出茅庐的Spark Cubing、更好地支持实时流式数据接入等等。Apache Kylin正逐渐从一个Hadoop上的传统OLAP平台，演变为一个Hadoop上的实时数据仓库。</span></div>
<div id="magicdomid814" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-PpUFS56ek66Q44UA" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746 mention:user-Helvetica Neue'- Helvetica"> </span></div>
<div id="magicdomid815" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-WJIz8SvETzA7dz7V" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746 mention:user-Helvetica Neue'- Helvetica">本演讲将介绍Apache Kylin v2.0带来的最新特性，以及它们背后的技术架构和设计理念：</span></div>
<div id="magicdomid816" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-NMzMFUd4qXFvt0tq" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746 mention:user-Helvetica Neue'- Helvetica"> </span></div>
<div id="magicdomid817" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-RGww0nM931AliST0" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746 mention:user-Helvetica Neue'- Helvetica">自v1.5起，Apache Kylin就支持通过micro-batch加载Kafka数据，实现了分钟级的准实时分析。到v2.0，Apache Kylin对Kafka数据源的支持更加稳定和友好，用户可以在同一个平台对流式数据和历史数据进行分析。</span></div>
<div id="magicdomid818" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-ziyDcltRK8hLVr5I" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746 mention:user-Helvetica Neue'- Helvetica"> </span></div>
<div id="magicdomid819" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-VnYYcfP6eIaQ7TRi" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746 mention:user-Helvetica Neue'- Helvetica">在过去，Apache Kylin只支持星型数据模型，给部分应用带来了局限。从v2.0开始，Apache Kylin将支持雪花模型，用户无需进行模型转换，就可以直接按现有数据模型在Kylin中建模，这使得Kylin可以更容易地应用在复杂案例当中。</span></div>
<div id="magicdomid820" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-Rb3bdPjDdyS0VE0U" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746 mention:user-Helvetica Neue'- Helvetica"> </span></div>
<div id="magicdomid821" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-LudCdkRcRvmGPOkR" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746 mention:user-Helvetica Neue'- Helvetica">预计算类分析平台意味着离线的数据预处理过程。对Apache Kylin而言，这个过程就是Cube的构建（Cubing），我们尝试使用Spark对现有的构建引擎进行大幅改进，并且收获了不错的初期结果。</span></div>
<div id="magicdomid822" class=""></div>
<div id="magicdomid823" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-ttZJm8IgVgK4dTN2" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746 mention:user-Helvetica Neue'- Helvetica">Apache Kylin对SQL语法的支持也在不断改进，如支持时间函数、窗口函数、百分位等复杂函数。这些改进的需求起源于社区，也最终由社区的力量推动而实现。</span></div>
<div id="magicdomid824" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-DcbIUeIf9oxuPyzI" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746 mention:user-Helvetica Neue'- Helvetica"> </span></div>
<div id="magicdomid825" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-slWbOdnGzLssLUDm" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746 mention:user-Helvetica Neue'- Helvetica">区别于其他的SQL on Hadoop技术，Apache Kylin始终专注于尽量使用离线预计算替代在线计算。在这个数据规模日益激增的时代，如果希望以稳定的性能面对各类规模的数据挑战，Apache Kylin或许才是你的首选！</span></div>
<div id="magicdomid826" class=""></div>
<div id="magicdomid827" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-HxEp8f2rHJs3PBPV" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746">演讲嘉宾：李栋</span></div>
<div class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-HxEp8f2rHJs3PBPV" data-author-name="幂幂"></div>
<div id="magicdomid828" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-fC6HGORUHIzAW3U5" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746 upload-image img-TpLEs6oZimm6LSYO image-width-100 "><img src="http://mmbiz.qpic.cn/mmbiz_png/5caYppSDlUWrSp7svTrWQLO0jickg9YohPD69tKibC5zcqgXdL3zlI5vhash2YBvIsvw1VDLeetgYVpKyPA4FesQ/640?wx_fmt=png&amp;wxfrom=5&amp;wx_lazy=1" alt="" /></span></div>
<div class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-VJfIC4uUTouw0Nea" data-author-name="幂幂"></div>
<div id="magicdomid829" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-VJfIC4uUTouw0Nea" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746">Kyligence技术合伙人兼高级软件架构师，Apache Kylin Committer &amp; PMC Member，专注于大数据技术研发，KyBot技术负责人。曾任eBay全球分析基础架构部高级工程师、微软云计算和企业产品部软件开发工程师。</span></div>
<div id="magicdomid830" class=""></div>
<div id="magicdomid831" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-Mje0AC6fGE3o21Y1" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746">时间&amp;地点</span></div>
<div id="magicdomid832" class=""></div>
<div id="magicdomid833" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-vQ6m4Lo1DfwWIaWP" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746 upload-image img-JkuMipUZ2ULXNpbt  "><img src="http://mmbiz.qpic.cn/mmbiz_jpg/5caYppSDlUWrSp7svTrWQLO0jickg9YohMX2JrGicCh4icfKoBsq92n4EWDxRF4YgwH9RXMichVXLznW0McvDtRQsA/640?wx_fmt=jpeg&amp;wxfrom=5&amp;wx_lazy=1" alt="" /></span></div>
<div class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-caU09MeM6XwRBBQO" data-author-name="幂幂"></div>
<div id="magicdomid834" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-caU09MeM6XwRBBQO" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746">时间：2017-02-25 14:00 至 18:00</span></div>
<div id="magicdomid835" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-FJJK9UM6gLcOqRFW" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746">地点：福建 厦门 思明区软件园二期观日路23号大放映厅</span></div>
<div class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-FJJK9UM6gLcOqRFW" data-author-name="幂幂"></div>
<div id="magicdomid836" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-UWy0iYBpVwunDmww" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746 upload-image img-lH2slmE8AlfL87Cf  "><img src="http://mmbiz.qpic.cn/mmbiz_jpg/5caYppSDlUWrSp7svTrWQLO0jickg9YohicA9chP6Z0Uy8H8bsNJ1ibVohCNoxTdZzb9TpicicXNDFQDDaEqczAdnWQ/640?wx_fmt=jpeg&amp;wxfrom=5&amp;wx_lazy=1" alt="" /></span></div>
<div class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-AWbO0LJlby2vR3Bp" data-author-name="幂幂"></div>
<div id="magicdomid837" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-AWbO0LJlby2vR3Bp" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746">时间：2017-02-26 14:00 至 18:00</span></div>
<div id="magicdomid838" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-FLJhZ4fBIXk7bFrn" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746">地点：福建 福州 工业路523号福州大学洪山校区经济与管理学院瑞光楼一层学术报告厅</span></div>
<div id="magicdomid839" class=""></div>
<div id="magicdomid840" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-4Za0LwUXKpt7fUkT" data-author-name="幂幂"><strong><span class="author-3380746">分享嘉宾&amp;议题</span></strong></div>
<div id="magicdomid841" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-8woqMLabRJUrxk0u" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746"> </span></div>
<div id="magicdomid842" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-FBID1AeRcCsFmwyw" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746">厦门站</span></div>
<div class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-FBID1AeRcCsFmwyw" data-author-name="幂幂"></div>
<div id="magicdomid843" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-spwd4Ubakf3RCBUZ" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746">《分布式数据库灵活存储机制与应用实践》</span></div>
<div id="magicdomid844" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-q0z03LMVS6VSjonx" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746">巨杉数据库技术总监乔国治</span></div>
<div id="magicdomid845" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-gEuiVT0SXN90ZTUY" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746">《Apache Kylin 2.0 - 从传统OLAP到实时数据仓库》</span></div>
<div id="magicdomid846" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-X6LkQ0nCxq35eDw3" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746">Kyligence技术合伙人兼高级软件架构师李栋</span></div>
<div id="magicdomid847" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-nVegjGHiPL8XfJSD" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746">【圆桌讨论】：开源在中国的商业化“前途”</span></div>
<div id="magicdomid848" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-hhsOQeYwRbu50gce" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746">《两级缓存框架 J2Cache 在开源中国的应用方案》</span></div>
<div id="magicdomid849" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-VfgXOPDZNumMoePZ" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746">红薯，开源中国社区创始人，J2Cache（源码）作者</span></div>
<div id="magicdomid850" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-jFBHwwmrJ9vcr4Y3" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746">《MySQL 5.7新时代》</span></div>
<div id="magicdomid851" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-PcprGbuIflWtMeOu" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746">叶金荣，知数堂培训联合创始人，Oracle MySQL ACE，MySQL 布道师</span></div>
<div id="magicdomid852" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-7u9ExsUo74xMjAqx" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746"> </span></div>
<div id="magicdomid853" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-p4utgU9qny82msNW" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746">福州站</span></div>
<div class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-p4utgU9qny82msNW" data-author-name="幂幂"></div>
<div id="magicdomid854" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-7BsNogbGpAQxBNaz" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746">《Apache Kylin 2.0 - 从传统OLAP到实时数据仓库》</span></div>
<div id="magicdomid855" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-mURs8e357wSyw209" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746">Kyligence技术合伙人兼高级软件架构师李栋</span></div>
<div id="magicdomid856" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-bBlcZH6Ba0Dz3y6a" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746">《MySQL 5.7新时代》</span></div>
<div id="magicdomid857" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-IKXJP7LesBIgYsxw" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746">叶金荣，知数堂培训联合创始人，Oracle MySQL ACE，MySQL 布道师</span></div>
<div id="magicdomid858" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-oY31nhZks0aS76rX" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746">《两级缓存框架 J2Cache 在开源中国的应用方案》</span></div>
<div id="magicdomid859" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-fYAOnLY87RuN9Eol" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746">红薯，开源中国社区创始人，J2Cache（源码）作者</span></div>
<div id="magicdomid860" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-SLRiRI08V5kyAWUC" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746">《开源视频软件的专业应用》</span></div>
<div id="magicdomid861" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-bWYnE6rfESoG6aUQ" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746">陈鸿，网龙公司云办公CTO</span></div>
<div id="magicdomid862" class=""></div>
<div id="magicdomid863" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-kiYkpp3xzzILc22K" data-author-name="幂幂"><strong><span class="author-3380746">Kyligence粉丝福利</span></strong></div>
<div id="magicdomid864" class=""></div>
<div id="magicdomid865" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-deZa8T4HFfcQuuqR" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746">为感谢大家一直以来对Kyligence的关注，小编为粉丝们准备了10张体验票，每张体验票价值50元！</span></div>
<div id="magicdomid866" class=""></div>
<div id="magicdomid867" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-lmj9m6gAOx9FCrg9" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746">体验票为：</span></div>
<div id="magicdomid868" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-9qSHOo6dAWZ9CsKc" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746">厦门站5张（包含会议和茶歇）</span></div>
<div id="magicdomid869" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-3k5lYcX8MnUA7wjB" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746">福州站5张（包含会议和茶歇）</span></div>
<div id="magicdomid870" class=""></div>
<div id="magicdomid871" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-WLGBt0O7LQw35tIY" data-author-name="幂幂"><strong><span class="author-3380746">获票方式</span></strong></div>
<div id="magicdomid872" class=""></div>
<div id="magicdomid873" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-sOhpVfMPuUuxCjUV" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746">1、在您的朋友圈转发本条推文，讲述如何知道Kyligence。</span></div>
<div id="magicdomid874" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-R8sq6PgIaf9sTkAX" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746">2、截图转发给小编。</span></div>
<div id="magicdomid875" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-jufBqW08UFM1CNNB" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746">3、小编将随机抽取10位幸运粉丝，幸运粉丝将免费获得源创会体验票1张。</span></div>
<div id="magicdomid876" class=""></div>
<div id="magicdomid877" class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-sWdef6wwXjVsC5f0" data-author-name="幂幂"><span class="author-3380746">数量有限，先到先得，赶紧行动吧！</span></div>
<div class="gutter-author-3380746 locate lineguid-sWdef6wwXjVsC5f0" data-author-name="幂幂"></div>]]></content:encoded>
